loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua is a petty trader and she sells food and vegetables at Ampeyin near Elmina.  Her husband is a welder.  They have six dependants.  Ekua has been in this business for some time now and she wishes to buy additional food items that have been requested by her customers.  Therefore, she will use this loan to buy food and vegetables to sell.  She hopes to use the new profits generated by this loan to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy food and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Adriana  Melissa

texts.es:
La señora Adriana  tiene 26 años,  es casada, reside en una Colonia periférica de San Pedro Sula, Cortes.  
Su actividad económica que le genera ingresos, es una pequeña pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica (arroz, frijoles, harina de trigo y de maíz, huevos) y productos de higiene. Su negocio lo inicio con recursos propios lo cual le ha permitido generar sus propios ingresos  para sostenerse.  Considera como principales dificultades por enfrentar, los altos precios de los productos alimenticios y las pocas ventas en algunas temporadas del año. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora que su afán es darle a  su primer hijo (esta embarazada) todo lo necesario en alimentación y salud cuando nazca. Dedica al negocio tiempo completo.
Solicito un préstamo de 15,000 lempiras para comprar maíz, frijoles, harina, verduras, lácteos, embutidos,  estos productos tienen bastante demanda  en los hogares de las familias. Espera con esta inversión sus ventas aumenten ofreciendo a sus clientes los productos necesarios.
Su plan es agrandar su pulpería y vender otros productos que no tiene en existencia para mantener una clientela mejor.
texts.en:
Adriana, 26, is married and living in a peripheral neighborhood in San Pedro Sula, Cortes.

Her income generating economic activity is a small grocery store where she sells basic staple items (rice, beans, wheat and corn flour, eggs) and hygiene products.  She started her business with her own resources which made it possible for her to earn her own income to support herself.  She believes that the main difficulty she has to face is the high price of food items and the poor sales in some of the seasons of the year.  She is a very enterprising woman who wants to give her first child (she’s pregnant) everything necessary in food and health when born.  She works full-time in her business.

She asked for a 15,000 lempira loan to buy corn, beans, flour, vegetables, dairy products, cured meats; these products are in high demand in family homes.  She hopes with this investment that her sales will increase offering her customers the necessary products.  Her plan is to enlarge the grocery store and to sell other products that she doesn’t have now to retain a better clientele.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a prospective student applying for a loan to start his undergraduate work on a Bachelor of Law at Strathmore University and this is his story:

My name is Peter. I come from a family of four. I have one older sister and two younger brothers. My sister has just completed her second year at university. My younger brother will be beginning at high school next year, while the last-born has just begun middle school. My father is a chemist. My mother is a nurse at a government hospital.

I believe in quality education. Having worked hard and attaining a position at one of the top schools in Kenya, I want to continue my pursuit for quality education at Strathmore University, a prestigious university in Nairobi, Kenya with a reputation for its excellence. I attained admission to Strathmore University to join the pioneer Law class at its recently opened Strathmore Law School. The course begins on 25th June 2012. 

I would require the loan so as to pay for my tuition costs. As the university gives the highest quality education in the country thus its tuition fees are also expensive. All my siblings require a lot of financial support from my parents who are average income earners which makes it hard for them to manage providing for all our education needs.  This has made me fear for my future, thus making me think of ways of completing my studies and attaining my dreams and ambition of becoming a top lawyer in the country.

This loan will enable me to focus on my studies as it will give me assurance that I will complete my course without any financial setbacks and will give me peace to focus on my class work and achieve my goals in life. 

I am an easy-going person who is easy to talk to. I do not anger quickly but instead listen to the whole story before I react. I am very social as I do not shy away from conversation. Also ambitious, I am quite the go-getter; once I have my eyes set on something, very little can be done to stop me. 

Upon graduation, I intend to venture into public service to provide legal assistance to the needy in society. I also plan to venture into policy making so as to make an impact not only in society but also the world.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for an undergraduate degree in Law at Strathmore University.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Unidas nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo de un grupo de mujeres que se encontraba trabajando en la misma zona. Lleva este nombre ya que las integrantes del grupo son mujeres muy unidas que se esfuerzan por sus familias y desean poder mejorar sus ingresos y a la vez crecer como personas.
La Sra.  Dolores, es una mujer muy emprendedora  y capaz de trabajar en unión en un grupo numeroso como lo es este. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo y también de lencería. Dice que tiene muy buena clientela ya que ella siempre tiene muy buena variedad que ofrecerles y es eso lo que los atrae.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, como ser remeras, jeans, shorts y de lencería para poder surtir su negocio y de esa forma poder seguir dando variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The "Mujeres Unidas" ["United Women"] committee was born as a result of the management and help of a group of women who work in the same neighborhood.  They took this name because the group members are women who are highly united in striving for their families, and who want to be able to improve their income while growing as people.

Señora Dolores is a very enterprising woman and one who is capable of working in union with a large group such as this one.  She works selling all kinds of clothing, and also lingerie.  She says that she has a very good clientele as she also has a good variety of products for sale, and this is what attracts her customers.

She is requesting the loan to purchase clothing, such as T-shirts, jeans, shorts and lingerie, so as to be able to stock up her business and in this way be able to continue providing variety to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and lingerie for sale.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El comité Ma. Auxiliadora es de la Ciudad de San Lorenzo,  las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo el ayudarse las unas a las otras por medio del trabajo en conjunto. Son mujeres muy unidas y con ganas de salir adelante y crecer en sus respectivos trabajos.
La Sra. Mirtha, es la presidenta del grupo tiene 39 años, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos. Ella cuenta que se dedica a la costura, y gracias a la buena calidad de su trabajo y a que siempre cumple con sus pedidos, ya tiene una buena clientela que siempre le acercan trabajos para hacer y de esa forma mejorar sus ingresos.
Ella quiere seguir trabajando y es por ello que solicita el crédito para la compra de hilos, telas botones, cierres y demás insumos, ya que tiene pedidos y quiere poder cumplir con ellos. Mirtha y su grupo agradecen por la ayuda que ella y su grupo están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The 'Ma. Auxiliadora' committee are from the city of San Lorenzo.  The members of this committee have a common goal: to help each other through their joint work.  They are a group of united women who have a desire to do well in life and grow in their respective businesses.

Mirtha is the group's president.  She is 39 years old, married, and has three children.  She tells us that her business is sewing and, thanks to the good quality of her work and the fact that she always fills her orders, she has a good customer base who are always coming to her with work.  This is how she improves her income.

Mirtha would like to continue working and so she is requesting a loan in order to buy threads, fabric, buttons, fasteners and other supplies.  She has orders and would like to be able to fill them.  Mirtha and her group are grateful for the help that they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy threads, fabric, buttons, fasteners and other supplies

loans.name: Maame

texts.en: Maame is a fish monger; she buys fresh fish from the market and smokes them for sale. Maame has been selling smoked fish for four years now. She is married with three children. She uses her income to support her husband to feed and clothe their children.  Maame will use her loan to purchase more fresh fish to smoke for sale.  Maame will expand her business with the new profit.

loans.use: purchase fresh fish to smoke for sale

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua is a fishmonger.  She buys fresh fish from the market and smokes them to sell.  Efua has been selling smoked fish for four years now.  She is married and has two children.  She uses her income to help her husband feed and clothe their children.  Efua will use her loan to purchase fresh fish to smoke for resale.  Efua will expand her business with the new profit.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish to smoke and sell.

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi  is a food vender. She  sells  maize  porridge and she serves it with bread and milk.  She is married  and has two children.  Esi  has been in this business for 3 years now.  She uses her income to help her husband  to feed and clothe her children and pay their school fees.  Her loan will be used to purchase bags of maize and flour to prepare her   bread and  porridge to sell. With the new profit, Esi  will expand her business

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize and flour to prepare her   bread and  porridge to sell.

loans.name: Abrewa Esi

texts.en: Abrewa   is a fishmonger. She sells salted fish at Ampanyin near Elmina. She is married and has six children. Her husband is a mason. Abrewa has been selling salted fish for 5 years now. She uses her income to help her husband to feed and clothe her children.  Abrewa will use her loan to buy salted fish to sell.  With the new profit she will expand her business.

loans.use: to buy salted fish to sell

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa  is divorced and has 5 childern. Adjoa sells "gari" which she has done for some time now.  As a single parent she uses her income to feed and clothe her children and pay their school fees. Adjoa will use her loan to purchase bags of "gari" to sell. With the new profit she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of "gari" (cassava flakes) to sell

loans.name: Aida

texts.es: Aida con su credikiva compró perfumería, cosmético, artículos de uso personal, con los cuales satisfizo a su clientela y también ganó un poco mas de dinero., porque los precios vinieron con muy buenos descuentos, Ella tiene una novedad y es que está fabricando calzado, por eso ha realizado una preventa y necesita responder a su nueva clientela; ella está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos como capelladas, suelas, pegante, taches etc. Esta nueva alternativa de ingresos le plantea una aplicación de  su oferta en la clientela y se extenderá hacia potenciales clientes con estos productos. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Gracias por seguir confiando en mi, por apoyar a los microempresa ríos y a su familia, lo que le permite crecer. “
texts.en: Aida used her Kiva loan to buy perfumery, cosmetics and personal use items that she satisfied customer demand with and also earned a bit more money because the prices came with very good discounts.  Now she’s got something new in that she’s manufacturing shoes.  She conducted a pre-sale and needs to respond to her new clientele.  She’s applying for a Kiva loan to buy raw materials and supplies like toecaps, soles, glue, tacks, etc.  This new income alternative gives an application of her offer to customers and she will extend towards potential customers with these products.   Her message to Kiva lenders is the following:  “Thank you for continuing to trust in me, for supporting micro entrepreneurs and their families which allows them to grow.”

loans.use: to buy shoe-making supplies.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
La Sra Justina tiene 58 años de edad, tiene hijos,  pero todos ya son mayores e independientes, que también la ayudan en lo que pueden.
La Sra Justina tiene una hamburguesería y boutique en el centro de Caacupé, gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y al buen precio que tiene ya se formo una clientela fiel. Cuenta que su marido le ayuda en los negocios y así juntos pueden salir adelante.
La meta de ella es poder seguir trabajando y de esa forma ser una gran microempresaria, y es en vista a ello que solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas para poder surtir su boutique, ya que siempre tiene muchos pedidos.
texts.en:
Justina is 58 and has children, but all are adults now and independent. They also help her in whatever they can.

Justina has a hamburger eatery and a boutique in the center of Caacupé. Thanks to the good quality of her products and her good prices, she has already established a loyal clientele. She says that her husband helps her in the businesses and this way they can move forward together.

Her goal is to be able to continue working and that way be a successful small business owner. In view of this, she is applying for the loan to buy articles of clothing to be able to stock her boutique, as she always has a lot of orders.

loans.use: To buy articles of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Ara Pyahu Group

texts.es:
El comité lleva por nombre Ara Pyahu, y ellas han asumido el compromiso de mantener unido el grupo y trabajar bajo un marco de honestidad y responsabilidad. Actualmente se encuentran en el cuarto ciclo con calificación excelente, integrado por 13 mujeres quienes trabajan arduamente para poder ayudar a sus familias.
Cipriana es una de miembro del grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo. Comenta que gracias a la variedad que tiene, ha logrado tener una gran cantidad de clientes que siempre compran de ella las prendas que tiene. El sueño de Cipriana es poder tener un gran salón donde vender sus prendas y así tener más clientes y mejorar sus ingresos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de invierno, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes, ya que se acerca la época de frio y tiene muchos pedidos.
texts.en:
The committee is called “Ara Pyahu” and they’ve assumed the commitment to stay together as a group and to work within a framework of honesty and responsibility.  They are currently in the fourth cycle with a grade of excellent.  It has 13 women members who work hard to be able to help their families.

Cipriana is a member of the group; she sells all types of clothes.  She comments that thanks to the variety she has she’s managed to have a large number of customers that always buy clothes from her.  Cipriana’s dream is to have a great salon to sell her clothes in and to have more customers and to improve her income.

She’s asking for the loan to buy winter clothes to stock up and have a variety to offer her customers because the cold season is approaching and she has many orders.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ñepytyvo Rekavo Group

texts.es:
Este comité Ñepytyvo Rekavo esta en el 2º ciclo del programa, esta integrado por 11 señoras donde  todas son vecinas, conocida de la zona, quienes se esfuerzan por poder dar a su familia todo lo quue necesitan para el día a día.
Maria Concepcion es la presidenta del grupo, ella es una persona con un gran espiritu de crecimiento, y siempre trata de transmitir ese espiritu a sus amigas. Ella solicita el crédito para poder surtir su negocio con carne, lacteos, gaseosas, vinos, panificados y demás, ya que es lo que mas venta tiene y quiere poder durtir bien su negocio.
Ella y su grupo agradecen por la ayuda que estan recibiendo de Kiva y de fundacion paraguaya, ya que les será de gran utilidad.
texts.en:
This committee, “Ñepytyvo Rekavo,” is in the program’s second cycle; it has 11 members who are all known neighbors in the zone who strive to give their families everything they need day to day.

María Concepción is group president.  She’s a person with a great spirit of growth and always tries to transmit this spirit to her girlfriends.  She’s asking for the loan to be able to stock her business with meat, dairy products, soft-drinks, wine, baked goods and others which is what sells the most and she wants to be able to stock her business well.

She and her group are grateful for the help they’re getting from Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya because it will be of great use to them.

loans.use: to buy meat, dairy products, soft-drinks, wine, baked goods and others.

loans.name: Oneida Concepción

texts.es: Invirtió su anterior crédikiva en la compra de mercancías como pantalones jeans, blusas, sweters. Desde que recibió el crédito y contó con un mayor capital, se le generó el crecimiento en su volumen de ventas. Refiere como novedad desde que obtuvo su crédito, sus dos hijos han culminado estudios secundarios. Su meta actual es adquirir un crédito que le permita mejorar su vivienda. Su mensaje es: "Gracias por mostrar interés en ayudar a muchos microempresarios".En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará productos de tocador, ropa exterior entre otros articulos, que tiene encargados y que ella aprovechará para venderlos en la época de mayor mocimento comercial para su negocio y esta es justamente la razón de éxito de la inversión de su credikiva.
texts.en:
Oneida invested her previous Kiva loan in the purchase of merchandise, such as jeans, blouses, and sweaters. Ever since she received the loan and could count on higher capital, the amount of her sales began to increase. 
She would also like to share the news that since her last loan, her two children have finished high school. 
Her goal is to acquire a loan that allows her to improve her housing.
Her message is: "Thank you for showing interest in helping so many small business men and women." 
She is currently applying for a new Kiva loan, which she will use to purchase toiletries, outerwear, and other items for which she has received orders. She will take the opportunity to sell them during the busiest season for her business, which is precisely the reason behind the success of her Kiva loan investment.

loans.use: to purchase toiletries, outerwear, and other items for which she has received orders.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, originaria de Estelí de oficio agricultora, es cliente de nuestra institución y su primer crédito Kiva fue de mucho beneficio para ella y su negocio pues lo invirtió en compra de granos básicos para vender. Ahora solicita este crédito para comprar insumos y pagar mano de obra para sembrar ½ manzana de maíz y ½ manzana de frijol. Espera obtener buenos rendimientos, cancelar su crédito. Una de sus metas es comprar ganado para producción de leche ya que es un producto de consumo masivo.
texts.en: Julia is a farmer from Estelí. Her first Kiva loan was very helpful, and she invested it in buying staple grains for resale. She is presently requesting another loan in order to purchase input materials for farming, and to pay additional workers to help with the planting of one acre of corn and one acre of beans. She hopes to have a good harvest and to pay back the loan. One of her goals is to buy dairy cows for producing milk, since it is a widely-consumed product.

loans.use: to purchase farming materials and pay additional workers to help her plant one acre of corn and one acre of beans.

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
12 mujeres de la ciudad de Villa Elisa se unieron con el objetivo de ayudar a sus familias por medio del trabajo de todas ellas. Es un grupo muy unido y que desea poder llegar hasta el máximo nivel del programa.
La Srta. Fátima es la tesorera del grupo, ella es estudiante de enfermería, también presta servicios de niñera y vende prendas. Como se puede notar ella es una persona muy trabajadora, empieza su trabajo desde muy tempranas horas y llega a la casa ya muy noche, nos dice que se esfuerza para poder ser una persona profesional y útil a los demás.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, como ser jeans, camperas, abrigos y demás tipos, con los cuales podrá seguir trabajando en las ventas y mejorar así sus ingresos para poder cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Twelve women from the city of Villa Elisa joined together with the objective of helping their families by means of their work.  This is a very united group that wants to reach the maximum level in the program.

Fátima is group treasurer; she’s a nursing student and also works as a babysitter and sells clothes.  As can be noted, she’s a very hardworking person.  
She starts her work very early and gets home very late at night.  She tells us that she strives to be able to become a professional person who is useful to others.

She asks for the loan to buy clothes like jeans, jackets, coats and other types to continue working in sales and improving her income to reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Elmer Orlando

texts.es:
Elmer, solicita un nuevo préstamo, pues esta iniciando un nuevo cultivo de maíz y considera que a través de este aporte podrá iniciar su trabajo con los elementos necesarios como el abono, insecticidas y pesticidas, que son los que ayudan a prevenir la plaga y a fortalecer la siembra.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a tener todo lo necesario para trabajar, las condiciones en su familia han mejorado por el avance que a tenido en sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Elmer is applying for a new loan, as he is starting a new corn crop and feels that through this contribution he will be able to begin his work with the necessary elements. These include fertilizer, insecticides and pesticides, which are the things that help him prevent pests and strengthen the crop.

The previous loan helped him to have everything he needed to work. His family's circumstances have improved through the progress he has made with his crops.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio ella se motivo porque a recibido un buen servicio y una buena atención, con el efectivo comprara materiales para aumentar la producción como maíz, aceite, quesillo, chicharrón, condimentos y bebidas.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le permitió tener al alcance todo lo necesario para que sus ventas fueran aumentando, con lo que a logrado tener una mejor condición de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is requesting a new loan to invest in her business.  She was motivated by the fact that she previously received good service and good attention.  She will use her money to buy materials with which to increase her production.  She will buy corn, oil, soft cheese, chicharrón (shredded pork), seasonings and drinks.

Rosa believes that her previous loan allowed her to have everything she needed to hand so that she could increase her sales.  As a result, she has managed to achieve better living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, soft cheese, chicharrón (shredded pork), seasonings and drinks

loans.name: Linda

texts.es: Linda  de 19 años de edad, es una joven comerciante,  que desde hace un año,  se dedica a la venta de productos mediante guidas especializadas. Ella también ayuda a su madre en la fabricación de limpiones industriales que ella misma vende y con lo cual genera otros ingresos. Su principal sueño es mejorar sus condiciones de vida mediante el crecimiento de su negocio, pues en condición de madre de un hijo de un año, tiene en sus manos, toda la responsabilidad  de lograr convertirlo en persona exitosa, tal como Linda sueña. En su negocio se esfuerza permanentemente y siempre está pendiente de las oportunidades del mercado, con el fin de lograr ingresos, por eso poco a poco su clientela se ha incrementado y necesita aumentar su capital de trabajo, pues en la actualidad debe  esperar a que le paguen sus clientes, reunir un dinero  para poder comprar en condiciones mas favorables, con descuentos especiales y en mayores volúmenes. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una máquina industrial, con la que incrementará su producción de limpiones, pues con ello obtiene mas rentabilidad, además de invertir en perfumería encargada y en cosméticos.  A su inversión credikiva,  le auguramos éxito porque está apoyada por su madre, quien conoce el mercado de limpiones industriales y ella es quien la está impulsando, así mismo porque la mercancía la compra   sobre los pedidos de sus clientes mas rentables, a los que cuida y por eso debe responder oportunamente, para que estén satisfechas sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Linda, 19, is a young merchant who has worked selling products through specialized guides.  She also helps her mother make industrial cleaning cloths that she herself sells and with which she generates additional income.  Her main dream is to improve her living conditions through the growth of her business.  As the mother of a one-year-old child she is responsible for turning him into a successful person, just as Linda dreams about.

She constantly makes the effort in her business and always is waiting for the market opportunities, with the goal of getting income.  For this reason, little by little her clientele has increased and she needs to increase her working capital, get some money together so she can have more favorable purchasing terms with special discounts and wholesale.  Currently she has to wait for her customers to pay her.

This is why she is coming for a Kiva loan, the first financing she has received from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With it she will buy an industrial machine with which she will increase her production of cleaning cloths and so have more profitability.  In addition, she will invest in perfume orders and in cosmetics.

We are certain of the success of her Kiva loan because she is supported by her mother, who knows the industrial cleaning cloth market and is the one who is driving her.  In addition, she buys her merchandise on the basis of requests from her most profitable customers, whom she looks after, so she needs to respond opportunely to meet their needs.

loans.use: to buy an industrial machine.

loans.name: Falta Marcar Quien No Esta En La Foto-Azucenas Group

texts.es:
Demetria es una señora joven tiene la edad de 37 años, es casada, su esposo Alfonso es albañil lo cual viven felizmente con una familia integrada por 4 hijos que dependen de ellos lo  cual uno se llama Oswaldo tiene14 años y cursa actualmente 2 ° de  secundaria, Jorge Luis tiene 13 años y cursa 1° de secundaria, Yeymi tiene 9 años y cursa 3° de primaria y diego tiene 7 años cursa 1° de primaria.
Demetria es una mujer trabajadora que es capaz de seguir adelante para tener una mejor vida para sus hijos, lo cual se dedica a la producción del pan, ella tienen apenas un año con su trabajo por lo que piensa invertir su préstamo en la compra de ingredientes como: Harina, Huevos, Piloncillo, azúcar entre otros que necesita para la elaboración de sus productos lo cual hace 2 veces a la semana los Lunes y sábados, también necesita hacer más grande su Horno  donde se hacen los panes y su techo hacer más grande por la temporada de la lluvia en eso son sus planes para el préstamo.
Demetria forma parte del Grupo Azucenas que está integrado por 10 mujeres capaces de seguir trabajando por una mejor vida a continuación se mencionan: Edilberta, Delfina, Alberta, Alejandrina, Demetria, Aureliana, Lorenza, Juvencia, Susana, Birgina lo cual se dedican a la venta de: Pan, Tamales, Refrescos, Calzado
texts.en:
Demetria is a young woman of 37.  She is married.  Her husband Alfonso is a builder, and they live happily together with their four children, whom they support. Oswaldo is 14 years old and is in the second year of high school.  Jorge Luis is 13 years old and is in the first year of high school. Yeymi is 9 and is in the third year of primary school, while Diego is 7 and in the first year of primary school.

Demetria is a hardworking woman, who wants to get ahead so she can make a better life for her sons.  For this reason, she makes bread.  She has only been doing this work for the last year, and she wants to use her loan to buy ingredients, such as flour, eggs, brown sugar, and refined sugar, which she needs for the products she makes twice a week on Mondays and Saturdays.  She also needs to enlarge the oven in which she makes the bread and to enlarge her roof for the rainy season.  These are her plans for the loan.

Demetria is a member of Azucenas Group, which consists of 10 women who are working to improve their lives.  The others are Edilberta, Delfina, Alberta, Alejandrina, Demetria, Aureliana, Lorenza, Juvencia, Susana, and Birgina, who work selling bread, tamales, soft drinks, and shoes.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make bread and to enlarge her oven and her roof.

loans.name: Karla Jasmina

texts.es: Karla, es dueña de una mueblería y también de un salón de belleza. Es clienta recurrente de nuestra institución y fue beneficiada con un crédito Kiva el cual utilizo para la compra de materia prima para elaborar diferentes tipos de muebles y de esta manera lograr impulsar la comercialización de los diferentes muebles que vende además también invirtió en su salón de belleza que es otro negocio que le ayuda a generar ingresos. Ahora quiere logra otro sueño que tiene el cual es mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio y su casa es por ellos que está solicitando un crédito Kiva para comprar material de construcción y una de las aéreas que le gustaría empezar a cambiar es lugar donde almacena los productos para que estén en mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Karla is the owner of a furniture store and a beauty salon. She is a borrower of our institution and has benefited from a Kiva loan which she used to buy raw material to make different types of furniture, and in this way fostering the sale of various furniture that she offers. She also invested in her beauty salon which is her other business and it helped her generate earnings. Now she has another dream which is to improve the infrastructure of her business and her house which is why she is asking for another Kiva loan in order to buy construction material and one of the areas she would like to begin to make changes is the place where she stores her products to keep them in better condition.

loans.use: to buy construction material

loans.name: Martha Mariela

texts.es: Martha, originaria de Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estelí,  es dueña de una pulpería la cual ha venido creciendo poco a poco , el primer préstamo Kiva lo utilizo precisamente para surtir su pulpería, comprar nuevos productos y  según nos cuentan logro hacer más clientes. Además le permitió invertir en compra de ropa nueva para vender y ofrecer variedad. Hoy está solicitando un crédito  Kiva para comprar ropa y surtir su tienda con productos alusivos al día de la madre que se celebra en este mes y la mayoría de sus clientes le están solicitando variedad para comprar y ella no quiere perder la oportunidad de vender y hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Martha is from Pueblo Nuevo, Estelí.  She owns a grocery store which she has been growing bit by bit.  She used her first Kiva loan to stock her store and buy new products.  She tells us that, as a result, she was able to gain more customers.  She was also able to invest in buying new clothing to sell.  Martha is requesting her current Kiva loan in order to buy clothing and to stock her store with products for Mothers' Day which is celebrated this month.  A lot of her customers are requesting a variety of products to buy and she doesn't want to lose the opportunity to sell products and grow her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing and stock her store with Mothers' Day products

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es:
Deysi, solicita un nuevo préstamo ya que quiere seguir produciendo una mayor variedad a su clientela ofreciendo arroz, aceite, frijoles, huevos, pan, embutidos, entre otros productos que son del agrado de los clientes.
Ella manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le ayudo a incrementar su negocio, a recibido un mayor nivel de ingresos los cuales han beneficiado a su familia con una mejor solvencia económica, ella espera seguir contando con estos prestamos para sostenerse en el negocio.
texts.en:
Daysi is asking for a new loan because she wants to continue producing a greater variety to her customers offering rice, oil, beans, eggs, bread, sausages, and other items that her customers like.

She said that the previous loan helped her to expand her business and she received a higher level of income which has benefited her family because they have a higher standard of living. She hopes to continue having these loans in order to maintain the business.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, beans, eggs, bread, and sausages

loans.name: Berta Yanira

texts.es:
Berta, necesita un nuevo préstamo para aumentar su granja pues se dispone a comprar un cerdo y concentrado además quiere realizar siembra de maíz para lo cual quiere comprarse abono y herbicidas, su objetivo es mantener trabajo en su hogar del cual pueda ayudar a su familia.
Ella tuvo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, le ayudo a comprarse mercaderia, actualmente sembrara granos basicos, porque se ha cambiado de residencia y vive mas en zona rural, por esta situación seguirá trabajando con la esperanza de tener buenos resultados y ayudar a su familia de la misma manera.
texts.en:
Berta needs a new loan to expand her farm.  She is planning to buy a pig and concentrated feed.  She would also like to sow some corn and so needs to buy fertilizer and herbicides.  Her goal is to keep working for the sake of her household so that she can help her family.

Berta's previous loan had a positive effect.  It helped her to buy merchandise.  She is now growing basic grains because she has moved house and now lives in a rural area.  She will continue working in order to obtain good results and continue helping her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs, concentrated feed, fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Erasmo

texts.es:
Erasmo, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para seguir trabajando en la agricultura pues esta en la época de la siembra,  para lo que necesita comprarse fertilizantes y semilla mejorada, con estos insumos podrá realizar de una mejor manera su cultivo.
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, ya que obtuvo una cosecha abundante con la que pudo realizar ventas obteniendo dos beneficios la alimentación de su familia y el ingreso económico, estos prestamos le ayudan para subsistir con su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Erasmo is requesting a new loan to continue working in agriculture.  As it is currently the sowing season, he needs to buy fertilizers and improved seeds.  These supplies will enable him to better grow his crops.

Erasmo's previous loan had a positive effect as he obtained a good yield and was able to sell his produce.  He saw two benefits: 1. he was able to feed his family, 2. he made income.  These loans help Erasmo to survive alongside his nuclear family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and improved seed

loans.name: Nafissatou Alain

texts.fr: Madame Nafissatou  Alain est une femme mariée qui vit dans l’une des banlieues sénégalaises. Elle exerce une double activité. Elle est agent commercial dans une grande société de la place et pratique en meme temps la vente de tissus, bijoux en plaqué et autres activités divers.  C’est depuis 2009 qu’elle a commencé  à importer des tissus pour les revendre. Elle consacre  presque 11 heures de la journée à son activité de commerce. Les revenus que lui  procure son activité lui permettent de prendre en charge le paiement de la domestique et le règlement de la facture d’électricité  chez sa maman. C’est un soutien de famille qui est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC  de la localité de sa zone d’habitation  et sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de tissus et de montres en plaqué qui seront destinés  a la vente.  Elle souhaite développer d’avantage son activité pour accroitre ses bénéfices afin de pouvoir participer à l’amélioration des conditions  alimentaires et au règlement des frais de scolarité de sa famille. Elle souhaite aussi renforcer son épargne afin de pouvoir dans l’avenir acquérir une maison. Dans le futur son vœu est de diversifier ses activités et  investir dans l’élevage et la mise en place d’un salon de couture.
texts.en:
Madame Nafissatou Alain is a married woman who lives in a Senegalese suburb. She has two jobs: she's a sales representative with a large company near her home, and she sells fabric, plated jewelry, and other various items. 

Since 2009, she's been importing fabric for resale. She spends almost 11 hours of her day on her business. The revenues that she earns with her business allow her to pay for the housework and electric bills at her mother's home. 

She is a pillar of the family who is a member of the local U-IMCEC branch office. She is asking for a loan of 500,000 frs to buy fabric and plated watches that she will resell. 

She would like to grow her business and increase her revenues so that she can help improve her family's food situation and pay for her family's schooling fees. 

She would also like to increase her savings to that she can buy a house in the future. In the future, her wish is to diversify her activities and invest in the construction and setup of a clothing boutique.

loans.use: to buy fabric and plated jewelry to resell.

loans.name: Noemi Candelaria

texts.es:
Noemí, solicita un nuevo préstamo pues su deseo de superación en el comercio espera realizarlo a través de inversiones periódicas comprándose ropa nueva, artículos plásticos, sandalias, sombrillas. Con esta compra espera mejor el nivel de venta del negocio.
Con el préstamo anterior logro generar mejores ganancias con la cuales a podido salir adelante con sus obligaciones de pago tanto del préstamo como los servicios básicos el considera que su situación en su familia a mejorado.
texts.en:
Noemí is asking for a new loan because she wants to succeed in business and she wants to do it by making periodic investments by buying new clothes, plastic articles, sandals and umbrellas. With this purchase she hopes to increase the number of business sales.

With her previous loan she generated higher profits with which she has been able to get ahead with her payment obligations of both the loan and basic services. She thinks that her family situation has improved.

loans.use: to buy new clothes, plastic articles, sandals, and umbrellas

loans.name: Futuro Mejor Group

texts.es:
Paulino de 32 años de edad, es soltero vive con sus padres en una aldea del municipio de Intibucá. quien desde muy joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando maíz, frijoles, papas y hortalizas. Tiene 10 años de realizar cultivos de papas.  Esta producción la vende en el mercado local. Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo de Lps.20,000.00, siendo este el cuarto préstamo solicitado a ODEF, y lo invertirá en la compra de semilla de papa, fertilizantes, fungicidas, herbicidas e insecticidas necesarias para el mantenimiento del cultivo de papas, esperando con esta inversión ampliar su cosecha para sacar mas producción. Su meta es trabajar más para obtener una mejor cosecha y mejorar la economía de su familia.
Es integrante de un grupo solidario denominado Futuro Mejor, formado por 3 miembros, todos se dedican al cultivo de papas y viven en la misma comunidad. El préstamo grupal  que solicitan es por Lps.60,000.00. En la foto se identifican así: a la izquierda Pedro, en medio Paulino y a la derecha esta Guillermo.
texts.en:
Paulino, age 32, is single and lives with his parents in a village in the Intibucá municipality.  Ever since he was very young he has devoted himself to growing corn, beans, potatoes, and vegetables.  He has been growing potatoes for ten years.  He sells his production at the local market.

He is currently requesting a loan for 20,000 lempiras, which is his fourth loan with ODEF.  He will use the loan to buy potato seeds, fertilizers, fungicides, herbicides, and insecticides that he needs to maintain his potato crops.  He is hoping that with this investment he will increase his crops and get greater production.  His goal is to work more in order to get a better harvest and to improve the family’s finances.

He is a member of the “Futuro Mejor” (Better Future) communal bank, which is comprised of three members.  All of the members grow potatoes and lives in the same community.  The group loan they are requesting is for 60,000 lempiras.

In the photo Pedro is on the left, Paulino is in the middle, and Guillermo is on the right.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds, fertilizers, fungicides, herbicides, and insecticides that he needs to maintain his potato crops.

loans.name: Jose Asencion

texts.es:
José tiene 26 años de edad, es casado, tiene dos hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Gualcinse Lempira.
El ha crecido en familia dedicada a la agricultura, anteriormente solo cultivaba granos básicos como maíz y frijoles, y hace 4 años ha puesto su dedicación a cultivar café. Vende café en oro (grano) en la zona donde vive. Solicita 20,000 Lempiras, siendo ya su segundo préstamo con la institución, para  comprar fertilizantes, foliar y va pagar mano de obra para el mantenimiento de la finca de café. Esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar la producción y a incrementar las ventas. Su plan es seguir dándole buena asistencia a la finca para obtener ganancias y poderles dar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José, age 26, is married and has two children.  He lives in a village in the Gualcinse municipality in Lempira.

He has grown up in a family devoted to agriculture.  He previously only grew basic crops like corn and beans.  Four years ago he started growing coffee.  He sells green coffee (the coffee seed before it is roasted, and after it is processed and dried) in the area where he lives.

He is requesting 20,000 lempiras, his second loan with the institution.  He will use the loan to buy fertilizer, to buy foliar fertilizer, and to pay for the maintenance labor on the coffee farm.  His plan is to continue giving the farm good care in order to get earnings and be able to give his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, to buy foliar fertilizer, and to pay for the maintenance labor on the coffee farm.

loans.name: Delmy Esperanza

texts.es:
Delmy, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para iniciar el cultivo de maíz y de frijol con el cual quiere comprarse abono y herbicidas para desarrollar bien la siembra ella espera tener un buen nivel de producción.
Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior compro todos los insumos agrícolas, los aplico al cultivo y logro tener una abundante producción de granos básicos, con la cual a logrado darle la alimentación necesaria a su familia.
texts.en:
Delmy is applying for a new loan to start her corn and bean crop. She wants to use it to buy fertilizer and herbicides so that her crop develops well. She hopes to have a good level of production.

She considers that with the previous loan she bought all the agricultural supplies, applied them to the crop, and succeeded in having an abundant production of staple grains. With this she has managed to give her family the food they need.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Maria Emerita

texts.es:
Doña Maria de 41 años de edad, casada, tiene 4 hijos los cuales ya son adultos, vive en el Municipio de Omoa Cortes.
Tiene 3 años de dedicarse a la venta de mercadería de ropa de segunda mano de toda clase como Pantalones, blusas, faldas, camisas, pantalones cortos y ropa interior. Esta actividad la ejerce de manera ambulante en las comunidades vecinas. Doña Maria es una mujer muy perseverante y cada día se esfuerza por mantener su negocio activo. Con este negocio ha podido solventar algunos problemas económicos y por eso se siente motivada a seguir trabajando y cuenta también con el apoyo de su esposo atreves de su trabajo.
Ha solicitado 2 prestamos con ODEF, los cuales ha trabajado muy bien donde ya cuenta con una buena clientela. Sus ganancias han aumentado, actualmente solicita su tercer préstamo de 1,000 lempiras para comprar mas Ropa como Pantalones, blusas, faldas, camisas, pantalones cortos y ropa interior y satisfacer a los clientes con las prendas de vestir que ofrece.
Su sueño es mantener su negocio estable y mantener una estabilidad económica para cualquier necesidad prioritaria que se presente en el futuro.
texts.en:
Maria, age 41, is married and has four adult children.  She lives in the Omoa municipality in Cortes.  For three years she has been selling all types of second-hand clothing like pants, blouses, skirts, shirts, shorts, and underwear.  She sells in an itinerant manner in the neighboring communities. 

Maria is a very perseverant woman.  Every day she puts forth great effort to keep her business active.  Through this business she has been able to resolve some financial problems.  That is why she is motivated to keep working.  She also has her husband’s support through his work.

She has requested two loans from ODEF.  The loans have worked very well, and she now has a good clientele.  Her earnings have increased.  She is currently requesting her third loan for 1,000 lempiras.  She will use the loan to buy more clothes like pants, blouses, skirts, shirts, shorts, and underwear.  She will do this to satisfy her customers with the clothes she offers.

Her dream is to keep her business stable and to maintain financial stability for any urgent necessity that occurs in the future.

loans.use: to buy more clothes like pants, blouses, skirts, shirts, shorts, and underwear.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia, necesita dinero para invertirlo en la compra de cerdos por eso solicita este préstamo que le permita obtener el efectivo para invertirlo en cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos, también aprovechara a comprarse maíz para la elaboración de tortillas ya que representa un ingreso mas para ella.
Antonia considera que el préstamo anterior le permitió tener mayor solvencia en el negocio y de la misma manera a mejorado las condiciones económicas en su familia.
texts.en:
Antonia needs money to invest in the purchase of pigs. Consequently she is applying for a loan which will enable her to pay cash for pigs and the food to feed them. She will also use the funds to buy corn to make tortillas since this represents more income for her.

Antonia feels that the previous loan allowed her to have greater solvency in her business. This has led to an improvement in the economic situation of her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed and corn.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.pt:
Separada e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negocio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, areia, pedra e outro) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e melhorar o seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é ampliar a sua casa e melhorar o seu trabalho para aumentar a renda familiar.
texts.en:
She's separated and has three children, all of which attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She runs a business of her own selling essential goods. With the present loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to enlarge her home and expand her business. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is to enlarge her house and improve her work in order to increase her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Joaquim

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 cunhada que vive com ele. 	
Trabalha como guarda fronteira, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, cimento, chapas, areia, pedra e outro) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja construir um centro comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos de investimento num negócio para aumentar a renda familiar.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children, one of which attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a sister-in-law who lives with him.
He works as border guard. With the present loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (beams, cement, metal sheets, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building his home.
In the future he wishes to build a shopping center. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so that he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the lack of funds for investing in a business and increasing his family's income.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (beams, cement, metal sheets, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Las Pioneras Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Las Pioneras“ está conformado por 16 emprendedores que se dedican al rubro del comercio, específicamente; venta de pan amasado y empanadas, almacén, venta de confites, venta de frutas y verduras, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de La Florida ubicada en la ciudad de Santiago.
Belinda, integrante del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie en segunda fila  ocupando el segundo lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste un pantalón azul, chaleco color lila, su cabello lo usa tomado, y usa lentes.
Ella se dedica al rubro de tejidos, se ocupa de este negocio desde hace 5 años, trabaja sola desde su casa y además hace clase  de tejidos los días martes y jueves.
Los materiales que va necesitando para sus tejidos los compra en distribuidoras de lanas. Con el crédito comprará mercadería para abastecer su negocio.
Las metas en su negocio son seguir enseñando a tejer y agrandar su negocio.
Belinda vive junto a su marido y su hijo y uno de sus sueños es poder prestar servicios a grandes tiendas de la ciudad de Santiago.
Belinda está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito y servicios otorgados por Fondo Esperanza. Además comenta que se siente muy cómoda con las reuniones y grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que existe generosidad y unidad.
La Florida es una comuna ubicada al suroriente de Santiago, capital de Chile, región Metropolitana. Su población actual es muy diversa, representando a todos los sectores socioeconómicos (alto, medio alto, medio y medio bajo). La zona cuenta con una activa vida comercial, la que se manifiesta en la existencia de varios nuevos centros comerciales. Es un sector que ha tenido un explosivo crecimiento demográfico en los últimos años.
texts.en:
This communal bank called Las Pioneras ("The Pioneers") is formed by 16 entrepreneurs who work in commerce, specifically in the sale of bread and empanadas, groceries, candy, fruits and vegetables, and services, among others.  They all live in the neighborhood of La Florida, located in the city of Santiago.  

Belinda is a member of the communal bank and can be found standing second from the left in the second row of the photo, dressed in blue pants, lilac vest, with her hair up and using glasses. She works in the area of textiles.  She has done this work for the last five years.  She works alone out of her house and also gives weaving classes on Tuesdays and Thursdays.  

She buys the materials she needs for her weavings from wool distributors.  With this loan she will buy merchandise to supply her business.  The goals of her business are to continue teaching weaving and to enlarge her business.

Belinda lives together with her husband and her son and one of her dreams is to be able to offer services to large stores in the city of Santiago.

Belinda is very happy and thankful for the loan and services offered by Fondo Esperanza.  In addition, she says that she feels very comfortable with the group and the meetings of the communal bank, since they are unified and generous.

La Florida is a community located in the southeast of Santiago, in the metropolitan area of the capital of Chile.  Its population is very diverse, representing all the socioeconomic sectors (upper, upper-middle, middle, and lower-middle).  The area has an active commercial life, which can be seen in the existence of various new commercial centers.  It is a sector that has had explosive demographic growth in recent years.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock her business.

loans.name: Sonia Nohemi

texts.es:
Sonia, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para seguir trabajando, pues depende de su negocio para el sostenimiento de su hogar, comprara ropa nueva como blusas, ropa interior y otras prendas de vestir, con lo que espera atender mejor a la clientela.
Con el préstamo anterior a crecido, su negocio esta en mejores condiciones, su situación familiar también ha mejorado, ya ha formado un buen historial de credito, esperando que a traves de ello pueda seguir teniendo la oportunidad de invertir en el negocio.
texts.en:
Sonia is asking for a new loan in order to continue working since she depends on her business to support her family. She will buy new clothes like blouses, underwear, and other items with which she hopes to better serve her clients. 

With the previous loan she grew her business. Her business has better conditions, and her family’s quality of life has also improved. Since she has a good credit history, she’s hoping that through this loan she can continue getting more chances to invest in the business.

loans.use: to buy new clothes like blouses, underwear, and other items.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción, vive con su familia, es una mujer trabajadora, se dedica a vender tortillas y tiene un puesto de frutas y verduras, está solicitando un préstamo para seguir trabajando y mantener el negocio, pues considera que a través de el podrá ir creciendo en el mercado, manteniendo la fidelidad de los clientes, ella se comprara maíz, verduras y frutas frescas, para la elaboracion de tortillas y la venta de verduras y frutas que administra.
Ella tiene como objetivo, el trabajar con prestamos, para poder superarse, ha tenido anteriormente tres prestamos quelos ha manejado muy bien.
texts.en:
Concepción lives with her family and is a hardworking woman. She sells tortillas and has a fruit and vegetable stand. She is applying for a loan in order to continue working and maintaining her business. She believes that through financing she will be able to grow in the marketplace by maintaining customer loyalty. 

She will buy corn, vegetables and fresh fruits so that she can make tortillas and sell vegetables and fruits at the stand she runs. Her objective is to work with loans so that she is able to succeed. She has had three previous loans, which she has managed very well.

loans.use: to buy corn, vegetables and fresh fruits.

loans.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es:
José, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio, su intención es crecer en la granja comprándose pollos de engorde pequeños para engordarlos, esto aumentara su potencial y espera poder aumentar con ello sus ventas.
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior fue mejorar las instalaciones de la granja, comprandose los materiales y ademas logro crecer en la granja, teniendo el fortalecimiento en sus ventas, y los ingresos económicos en su familia han sido mejor.
texts.en:
José decided to apply for a new loan so that he could invest in his business. His intention is to grow his farm by purchasing small chickens for fattening. This will increase his potential in hopes of generating more sales.

His previous loan resulted in improvements to the facilities on his farm. He purchased materials and was able to grow his farm, which strengthened his sales and improved his family's financial earnings.

loans.use: to buy small chickens for fattening.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José, es un hombre luchador y responsable vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos de 14, 12, 9 y 7 años de edad ellos estudian y dependen de él, José se dedica a las actividades agropecuarias como la siembra de granos básicos, también en la albañilería esto se lo enseño su padre, lo ha venido realizando desde que tiene su propia familia.
El solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en insecticidas y fertilizantes para la siembra de maíz y frijol en dos manzanas de terreno esta compra le ayudara a fortalecer y proteger de plagas el cultivo. con la esperanza de tener una cosecha sana para poder comercializarla. uno de sus riesgos precisamente son las plagas y los cambios climáticos.
El objetivo de José es obtener mejores ganancias por la venta de sus cosechas y que asi mismo le permita darle a sus hijos la alimentación, educación y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Jose is a responsible and tenacious man who lives with his wife and their 4 children, aged 14, 12, 9 and 7.  His children are in school and are dependent upon him.  Jose works farming staple grains and he also works in construction, a trade he learned from his father.  He has been doing this work ever since he started his own family.

He is requesting a loan to purchase insecticides and fertilizers for his corn and bean crops that are planted on two manzanas (about 3.5 acres) of land.  This purchase will help him to strengthen his crops and protect them from pests.  He hopes to have a healthy harvest so that he can sell his crops.  In doing this, he faces the risk of weather events and of pests.

Jose's goal is to get better earnings from the sale of his harvests, so that he can provide his children with food, education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy insecticides and fertilizers for his corn and bean crops

loans.name: Jose Ovidio

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la crianza de ganado y siembra de granos básicos es una persona honrada y responsable, vive con sus dos hijos de 9 y 5 años de edad los dos dependen económicamente de el, el trabajo lo realiza todos los días desde las cinco de la mañana asta las cuatro de la tarde desde hace 15 años.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insecticidas y fertilizantes para iniciar la siembra de maíz y frijol, esta compra le proporcionara mejores oportunidades de obtener una cosecha abundante y libre de plagas para poder comercializarlas.
Su aspiración es ir creciendo año con año en el negocio hacerlo mas rentable que le permita ganar mas dinero para su familia.
texts.en:
José raises cattle and plants staple grains. He is an honest and responsible person. He lives with his two children, ages 9 and 5, who are economically dependent on him. He has been working every day from five in the morning until four in the afternoon for the past 15 years.

He is applying for a loan to purchase insecticides and fertilizer in order to start planting corn and beans. This purchase will give him a better chance of obtaining an abundant harvest that is pest-free so that he can market it.

His aspiration is to continue growing his business year after year and making it more profitable so that he can earn more money for his family.

.

loans.use: to buy insecticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La Sra. Mercedes tiene 27 años. Es madre soltera de un niño aun pequeño. Se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir, calzados deportivos, juegos de sabanas, cortinas, toallas y otro tipo de productos para el hogar.
Realiza estas ventas  en varias zonas del país desde el año 2010. Anteriormente trabajaba como vendedora en una boutique, pero en este nuevo trabajo puede generar mejores ingresos para ofrecer una vida más digna a su hijo.
Mercedes necesita de este crédito para adquirir frazadas, edredones y prendas para la temporada de invierno que inicia, pues ya recibe los pedidos de su clientela y debe cumplir con ellos. Ella anhela poder tener su casa propia, pues vive con sus padres, y también desea poder garantizar un buen vivir a su hijo, brindándole todo lo básicamente necesario.
texts.en:
Sra. Mercedes is 27 years old and a single mother with a small child. She sells articles of clothing, sports shoes, bedding sets, curtains, towels, and other types of household products. Mercedes has been generating sales in different parts of the country since 2010. She previously worked as a saleswoman at a boutique, but this new job allowed her to generate more income and offer a more decent life to her son.

Mercedes needs this loan to acquire blankets, quilts, and articles of clothing for the winter season that is about to begin. She has already received orders from her customers and needs to fulfill them. Her wish is to have a house of her own since she lives with her parents. She also wants to guarantee a good life for her son and provide all of his basic needs.

loans.use: to buy blankets, quilts, and articles of clothing.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É professora, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, blocos, e outro) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e construir um murro, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a ampliar a sua casa e concluir os Estudos.
texts.en:
Maria is married and the mother of three children, all of whom go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She is a teacher.  She will use her current loan to buy construction material (cement, sand, stone, bricks, etc.) to continue work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to finish her home and construct a wall, for which she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenges are making her home bigger and finishing her studies.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, bricks, etc.) to continue work on her home.

loans.name: Maria Paz

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y a la elaboración de pan vive actualmente con su esposo y su hijos de 7 y 5 años de edad, este oficio ella lo aprendió por la misma necesidad económica desde hace 6 años.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de materia prima azúcar, maíz, manteca, levadura, huevos y leña, esto le ayudara a la producción tanto de tortillas como de pan con el objetivo de mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
La aspiración de María es poder tener una maquina que le ayude a procesar los materiales para la elaboración, del pan ya que esto le ayudara a agilizar su trabajo y poder producir mas, dandole la oportunidad de proveer a su familia lo necesario y mejorar su futuro.
texts.en:
María sells tortillas and makes bread. Currently she lives with her husband and two children, ages 7 and 5. She learned these tasks six years ago due to economic necessity.

She is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as sugar, corn, butter, yeast, eggs and firewood. This will help in the production of tortillas as well as bread, with the objective of improving her income.

María’s aspiration is to be able to own a machine that will help her process the materials for bread making because this will help speed up production and enable her to produce more, giving her the opportunity to provide the necessities for, and improve the future of, her family. 

.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as sugar, corn, butter, yeast, eggs and firewood.

loans.name: Jose

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante dono do próprio negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, feijão, refrescos, amendoim, e outro) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja comprar uma viatura para transportar os produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é garantir o sustento dos Estudos dos filhos ate a Universidade e manter o negócio forte.
texts.en:
Jose is married and is the father of two children who both go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He owns his own business selling basic goods, and with the current loan, he will buy products (rice, beans, soft drinks, peanuts, etc.) to increase the quantity of his merchandise.

In the future, he hopes to buy a vehicle to transport his products, for which he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is guaranteeing the educational funds for his children until college and maintaining a strong business.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (rice, beans, soft drinks, peanuts, etc.)

loans.name: Delmira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Delmira, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, ella es ama de casa y apoya a su esposo en las labores agrícolas ya que de ello obtiene lo necesario para el sustento familiar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como el abono, insecticidas y pesticidas, esta compra le ayudara a proporcionarle a su esposo lo necesario para la ejecución de la siembra.
La aspiración de Delmira es que sus siembras sean productivas y poder trabajar para mejorar las condiciones y el futuro de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Delmira lives with her husband and three children.  She takes care of the home and supports her husband in his agricultural work so that he can provide what's necessary to support their family.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of agricultural supplies such as manure, insecticides and pesticides.  This purchase will help her to provide her husband with those things necessary for sowing.

Delmira's aspiration is that her crops will be productive and that she can work to improve her conditions and her children's future.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Belinha

texts.pt:
Divorciada e mãe de 6 filhos todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 4 netos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos, e com o presente empréstimo pretende legalizar o terreno e comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, blocos, ferro, e outro) para dar inicio a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a obra da sua casa e fazer crescer o seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos de investimentos.
texts.en:
Belinha is divorced and is the mother of six children, who are all adults.  She lives in her own family with her children and also supports four grandchildren who live with her.  She owns her own business selling various products.  With the current loan, she will pay the legal fees for her land and buy construction materials (sand cement, bricks, iron, etc.) to start work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to finish her home and to grow her business.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is having insufficient investment funds.

loans.use: to pay for the legal fees for her land and to buy construction materials (sand, cement, bricks, iron, etc.).

loans.name: Carolina

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filha que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhas enviando dinheiro. 	
É negociante dono do próprio negócio de venda de refeições e bebidas, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, cervejas, carne de porco, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da mercadoria.
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e apoiar a filha nos Estudos até se formar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é construir uma barraca no quintal da sua casa para melhor gerir o seu negocio.
texts.en:
Carolina is the single mother of one daughter who is in school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports two nieces by sending them money.  She owns her own business selling meals and drinks.  With her current loan, she will buy products (soft drinks, beer, pork, etc.) to increase the quantity of her mechandise.

In the future, she hopes to make her business grow and to support her daughter with her education until she completes college.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is building a stand in her yard to manage her business better.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (soft drinks, beer, pork, etc.).

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Casada e não tem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ela. 	
É professora, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material (cimento, pedra, areia, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir a casa e mobilar.
texts.en: Amelia is married and doesn't have children.  She lives in her own home with her family and supports two nephews who live with her.  She is a teacher.  With her current loan, she will buy construction materials (cement, stone, sand, etc.) to continue work on her home.  In the future, she wants to finish her home to improve her family's comfort.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenges are finishing her home and furnishing it.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, etc.).

loans.name: Edlyn

texts.en:
Edlyn is 27 years old and married. She has four children, and two of her children are currently in school. Edlyn works very hard to provide for them.

Edlyn runs a wholesale business that sells sugar and cooking oil in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell.

Edlyn has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Edlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additional stock to sell

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a tailoring business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her tailoring business.

Evangeline has been in this business for 10 years. Evangeline earns more income from food vending.

Evangeline has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of some loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional materials for her business

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 36 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Evelyn is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Evelyn has been raising pigs for three years and also earns some additional income from buying and selling crabs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is married with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Gina is 40 years old. Three of her children are in school.

Gina has a food vending business in the Philippines. Gina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Gina has been in this business for two years. In the future, Gina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients for her business

loans.name: Salve

texts.en:
Salve is a married parent of six children who works hard to support her family.

She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines and earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish. Salve is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and piglets for her pig fattening business.

Salve has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional feed and piglets

loans.name: Surja Maya

texts.en:
Surja Maya is 50 years-old. She is Married and has two children ages 25 and 26. In 2000, she established her tea shop business. Working seven days a week and twelve hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy food materials for her business. In the future, Surja plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

Whether on the streets of Kathmandu, or in the villages outside of the capital, tea shops are places of business and meeting in Nepal. Called a chiya pasal, these tea shops make a sweet, milky tea that can be purchased for a few cents a cup. With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to keep their store shelves stocked while increasing their profit margins by buying in greater volume.

loans.use: to buy food materials

loans.name: Ma. Karen

texts.en:
Ma. Karen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling used clothing in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

Ma. Karen has been in this business for four years. Ma. Karen earns more income from fishing.

Ma. Karen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Mayramkul

texts.ru:
Майрамкуль 61 год, замужем, имеет 5 детей. Майрамкуль с 1982 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Майрамкуль,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова с приплодом и 13 овец, ежемесячная прибыль  с продажи молока  местному перерабатывающему заводу составляет около 5,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Майрамкуль обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойной коровы.  Доходы от кредита Майрамкуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Mayramkul is 61 years old, married, and has 5 children. She has been raising livestock since 1982, having started her business with an initial investment of 20,000 som. Thanks to her hard work, Mayramkul's herd presently has 1 dairy cow with offspring and 13 sheep. She earns roughly 5,000 som (KGS) per month by selling milk to the local dairy plant.

In order to continue developing her business, Mayramkul has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a dairy cow. She plans to invest her profits from this loan into further increasing the size of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Rasmi

texts.en:
Rasmi is 24 years old.  She is married and has two children who are five and two years old.  In 2011, she established her grocery store business.  Working seven days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid four loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy grocery goods for her business. In the future, Rasmi plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy. Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Muhtabar

texts.ru: Мухтабар проживает в городе Чкаловск. Ей 54 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она семь лет как занимается торговлей. На сегодняшний день Мухтабар занимается торговлей парфюмерии, косметики и хозяйственных товаров. Она берет кредит для покупки детских игрушек и парфюмерии.
texts.en: Muhtabar lives in the city of Chkalovsk. She is 54 years old, married, and has three children. She has been in the retail business for the past seven years. Currently, Muhtabar sells perfumes and cosmetics, as well as household goods. She is taking this loan to purchase children's toys and perfumes.

loans.use: to buy children's toys and perfumes

loans.name: Nurjan

texts.ru:
Нуржан 40 лет, одна воспитывает 2 детей. Нуржан с 2005 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 5,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Нуржан,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова с приплодом и 20 овец, ежемесячная прибыль  с продажи молока  местному перерабатывающему заводу составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуржан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого рогатого скота.  Доходы от кредита Нуржан планирует частично вложить в ремонт квартиры, и часть - в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Nurjan is 40 years old and a single mother of 2 children. She has been raising livestock since 2005, having launched her business with an initial sum of 5,000 som.
