loans.use: to buy milk and cheese to sell.

loans.name: Tacuarindy Group

texts.es:
El comité lleva por nombre Tacuaridy,  debido a que  así se llama la compañía donde viven, han asumido el compromiso de mantener unido el grupo y trabajar siempre dentro del respeto y cooperación.
Maria es parte de este grupo, y nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de tortas en lo que le va muy bien, ya que tiene muy buenas manos para los dulces. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Maria solicita el crédito para la compra de leche, manteca, harina, azúcar, dulces y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus tortas y de esa forma poder cumplir con pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee is called “Tacuaridy” because that’s the name of the region they live in.  They have taken on the commitment to keep their group together and to always work in a spirit of respect and cooperation.

María is part of this group and she comments that she works selling cakes and does very well since she has very good hands for making sweets.  She’s a very hardworking person who very much wants to get ahead and help her family.

María is asking for the loan to buy milk, shortening, flour, sugar, sweets and other supplies to be able to continue making her cakes and be able to fill all the customer orders.

loans.use: to buy bakery supplies.

loans.name: Toledo Group

texts.es:
El comité Toledo es de la zona de San Lorenzo. Ya son reconocidas en la zona por su trabajo en pos del bienestar de la comunidad. Es un comité muy antiguo que nunca se atraso en sus obligaciones.
Gloria es la presidenta de este grupo, ella motiva a sus amigas y las ayuda a que día a día quieran seguir trabajando juntas y de esa forma poder ayudar a sus familias. Ella se dedica a la venta de leche, y cuenta que ya tiene una clientela formada, pues siempre compran de ella su producto. Su sueño es poder tener una dulcería y poder seguir ayudando de esa forma a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, leche, y demás insumos para poder seguir con la venta de su dulce, ya que es el medio que tiene para aportar en la casa.
texts.en:
The Toledo Group is from the San Lorenzo area. They are known in the area for their community work. It is a a very old group that never falls behind in their obligations.

Gloria is the president of this group. She motivates her friends and helps them from day to day, wanting to continue working together and in this way to be able to help their families. She works selling milk, and she already has an established client list, and they always buy her product. Her dream is to be able to have a candy store and to be able to continue helping her family.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy sugar, milk, and other supplies in order to be able to continue selling candy, since this is the way in which she contributes to the house.

loans.use: to buy sugar, milk, and other supplies

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco Antonio es un joven muy trabajador y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Ica, la cual está caracterizada por su gente trabajadora y clima cálido; Marco Antonio es un joven muy estudioso que sueña convertirse en un gran Abogado.   
Actualmente trabaja diariamente en su negocio como chofer de taxi y también brinda servicios de movilidad escolar, él trabaja desde las 8 a.m hasta las 5 p.m ; Marco Antonio cuenta con la fidelidad de sus clientes, debido a su buen carisma y servicio hacia ellos. 
Marco Antonio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada él podrá comprar una laptop, la cual le servirá de gran ayuda para el desarrollo de sus prácticas pre-profesionales y para el mejor desempeño de sus servicios de asesoramiento legal que ofrece a sus clientes independientes; de esta manera Marco Antonio podrá lograr su sueño de contar con un vehículo propio, el cual le genera mejores ingresos y con ello poco a poco podrá tener su casa propia y su estudio jurídico.
texts.en:
Marco Antonio is a very hardworking, enthusiastic young man.  He lives in the city of Ica which is noted for its hardworking people and its hot climate.  Marco Antonio is a very studious young man who dreams with becoming a great attorney.

He currently works daily in his business as a taxi driver and also provides school transportation services.  He works from 8am until 5pm.  Marco Antonio has loyal customers due to his good charisma and service towards them.

Marco Antonio is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy a laptop that will be of great use for his pre-professional work and to improve the legal assessment services he provides his independent customers.  In this way, Marco Antonio will be able to reach his great dream of owning a vehicle of his own that will generate better income so that gradually he’ll be able to have a house of his own and his law office.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Sonia Del Carmen

texts.es: Sonia  estuvo muy feliz porque pudo rescatar nuevos clientes, su clientela está regresando y tiene una oferta permanente; con su crediKiva anterior, pudo comprar telas hilos y encajes para hacer muchos vestidos, especialmente para damas,  "Gracias por el apoyo recibido que me ha ayudado a salid adelante y a tener nuevos sueños". A ella le ha ido tan bien que actualmente su capital de trabajo, se torna insuficiente para cumplir con su creciente demanda y por eso acude nuevamente a un  credikiva, con el cual planea comprar telas e insumos para elaborar vestidos de baño para niñas, porque su clientela se ha desbordado en pedidos. Su meta mas adelante es tener su propio taller en un local bien acondicionado, junto a su almacén donde exhiba y venda los productos que elabora en su propio taller y es que este es su máximo sueño.
texts.en: Sonia is happy because she was able to gain new customers. Her clientele is returning, and she has a steady flow of business. With her previous Kiva loan, she was able to purchase lace and fabric to make many dresses, especially for women. "Thanks for the support that has helped me get ahead and have new dreams." Her business has been so prosperous that her current working capital has been insufficient to meet growing customer demand, which is why she is once again requesting a Kiva loan. With this loan, she plans to purchase the fabric and other supplies needed to make girls' swimwear as this is what her customers are ordering. Her future goal is to have her own well-equipped sewing workshop and store in which she can display and sell the merchandise that she makes in her own shop. This is her ultimate dream.

loans.use: to purchase the fabric and other supplies needed to make girls' swimwear.

loans.name: Nelly Gloria

texts.es:
Nelly es una joven madre de 25 años muy trabajadora, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisco, caracterizada por sus hermosas playas y clima cálido. Cuando Nelly cuenta con tiempo libre le gusta preparar deliciosos postres acompañada de su pequeño hijo de 3 años, siendo su comida favorita el "Arroz Chaufa"; con mucho empeño logró concluir sus estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado poder ser una Enfermera. 
Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación, y gracias al apoyo de su madre, Nelly se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, especialmente de tubérculos, ella trabaja diariamente un aproximado de 14 horas y puede atender hasta 20 ó más clientes, debido a su experiencia, acogida y carisma hacia la atención de ellos.  
Nelly se encuentra muy agradecida por la ayuda brindada por los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a ellos va poder comprar más mercadería, tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, etc, para equipar mejor su negocio de venta de abarrotes y con ello más adelante podrá obtener un puesto en el mercado de su ciudad, de esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida para ella y para su pequeño hijo, asegurando un mejor porvenir para ambos.
texts.en:
Nelly, 25, is a young, very hardworking mother.  She lives in the city of Pisco, noted for its beautiful beaches and hot climate.  When Nelly has free time she likes to make delicious desserts alongside her three-year-old son.  Her favorite dish is “Arroz Chaufa.”  With much dedication she managed to complete secondary school but would have liked to be able to be a Nurse.

With much effort and dedication and thanks to her mother’s support Nelly sells groceries, especially tubers.  She works approximately 14 hours a day and can tend to up to 20 or more customers because of her experience, her acceptance and charisma toward customer service.

Nelly is very grateful for the support provided by Kiva lenders because thanks to them she will be able to buy more merchandise like rice, sugar, oil, etc. to better stock her grocery store and with this later on be able to get a stand in her city’s market to improve her income and her and her son’s quality of life thus insuring a better future for both of them.

loans.use: tyo buy merchandise.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She sells clothes, shoes and crockery at the market to the general public. She has been in this business for the last six years. Mary lives in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. She dreams of opening a kiosk in the future. She describes poor transportation infrastructure to be her major challenge, especially during the rainy season. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and rent.

The loan of 49,980 Kenyan shillings (KES) will enable her to buy iron sheets for roofing her house.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets for roofing.

loans.name: Alan Elmer

texts.es:
Alan es un hombre trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, caracterizada por sus hermosas playas y clima cálido; Alan convive con su pareja, de cuya relación tiene 2 hijos con los cuales le gusta pasar su tiempo libre haciendo deportes y comiendo su plato favorito, el cual es el riquísimo "Ceviche". Alan con mucho empeño logró culminar sus estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Contabilidad. 
Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación y gracias al apoyo de su Padre, Alan trabaja diariamente en su negocio como chofer de mototaxi, él le dedica aproximadamente 14 horas a su negocio y pueda atender hasta 40 clientes; Alan piensa que le va bien en su negocio debido a su buen trato y a los 5 años de experiencia que lleva brindando servicio de mototaxi.
Alan se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá comprar otra mototaxi, la cual le servirá de mucho para mejorar sus ingresos y con ello lograr su sueño de poder construir su vivienda y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Alan is a hardworking man living in the city of Pisco that’s noted for its beautiful beaches and hot climate.  Alan lives with his spouse and they have two children he likes to spend his free time with playing sports and eating his favorite dish which is the very delicious “Ceviche.”  Alan managed through much dedication to complete secondary school but would have liked to have studied the career of Accounting.

With much effort and dedication and thanks to his father’s support, Alan works daily at his own business as a mototaxi driver.  He spends about 14 hours at work and can tend to up to 40 customers.  Alan thinks that he does well in his business because of the good treatment he provides and to the five years’ experience he has providing mototaxi service.

Alan is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help provided he will be able to buy another mototaxi that will be very useful to improve his income and with it reach his dream of being able to build his house and provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy a new mototaxi.

loans.name: Mariamu

texts.en:
Mariamu is a divorced woman who has six children. Four of her children are in school. She has been operating a food stall for five years now. She describes market competition to be her major challenge and she hopes to have a café in the future. Mariamu resides in her own house that has no electricity or piped water. She sells mostly to her neighbors and passersby. 

With the loan of KSH 35,000, she plans to purchase beans, sugar, rice, and wheat flour.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sugar, rice, and wheat flour.

loans.name: Edgard Ewerthon

texts.es:
Edgard es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, playas hermosas, así como también se desarrolla la agricultura sobre todo el cultivo del arroz, ya que es considerado uno de los mejores del mundo. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre a Edgard le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio, en ocasiones también le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo Pescado Frito. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres el solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar una carrera universitaria.

Con mucho entusiasmo Edgar trabaja en su negocio de servicio de transporte de carga, el l dedica  a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y sobre todo conoce todas las zonas de su ciudad.

Edgar está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general y compra de repuestos para su camioneta, de esta manera el tendrá un vehículo en buen estado y así podrá seguir luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Crecer como microempresario”
texts.en:
Edgard’s a very hardworking man living in the city of Camaná, a city noted for its hot climate, beautiful beaches and also for agriculture, especially rice growing that’s considered one of world’s best.  When he has free time available he likes to play soccer with his neighbors and friends in the neighborhood and occasionally he enjoys very much to eat one of his favorite dishes which is the very delicious “Pescado Frito.”  Due to his parents’ reduced economic resources he only attended secondary school but would have liked to have studied a university career.

With much effort Edgard works in his business transporting cargo.  He spends about 10 hours daily at work and can tend to up to 20 customers per day.  He believes that he does well in his business because he’s very responsible and above all because he knows all the city’s zones.

Edgard is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to do general service and buy spare parts for his van in order to have a vehicle that’s in good condition to continue striving daily to make his greatest dream a reality: to grow as a micro businessman.

loans.use: to service his vehicle and to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a married woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She is married to Oliver, a driver, and they live in a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Agnes sells fuel mostly to motorcycle operators and she aspires to hire employees in future. She joined Yehu to secure loans to boost her business. Her greatest monthly expenses are rent, food, and school fees. Agnes also operates a food stall as her side business selling to the local residents.
She plans to use her loan of KES 50,000 to purchase jerrycans of fuel for sale.

loans.use: to purchase jerrycans of fuel for sale.

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en:
Hadija is a 35-year-old married woman with four children, all of whom are in school. She operates a food stall, which has been running for the last 15 years. She sells her goods from home to her neighbors. Hadija dreams of opening a café in the near future. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Much of her monthly expenditure goes to food for the family. Her main reason for joining Yehu was to get access to loans. Other sources of income include earnings from her husband.

Hadija plans to purchase more stock of beans, rice, and wheat flour using the requested loan.

loans.use: to purchase beans, rice, and wheat flour

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en: Jackson is taking out another loan of KES 12,725 to provide medical coverage for his family. He says that his business is going well and that he aspires to purchase a passenger vehicle. He thanks Yehu and Kiva for the financial support.

loans.use: to provide medical coverage for his family.

loans.name: La Golondrina Group

texts.es:
El Comité La Golondrina es un comité  de Mujeres Rurales de la Fundación Paraguaya, está conformado por 10  mujeres que de la ciudad de Curuguaty, que trabajan para poder ayudar a sus familias.
Viviana es una de estas mujeres, ella se dedica al comercio, tiene una despensa bien surtida, en la cual trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día. Viviana siempre trata de ser cada día mejor y así ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestible, bebidas, lácteos, enlatados y demás insumos para poder seguir ofreciendo una buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: The committee La Golondrina, or The Swallow, is a committee of rural women from the Paraguayan Foundation.  It is made up of 10 women from the city of Curuguaty who work in order to help their families.  Viviana is one of these women.  She works in sales and has a well-stocked store in which she works every day from very early in the morning.  Viviana always tries to be better every day and thus to help her family.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase food, drinks, milk products, canned goods and other consumables in order to continue offering a good variety to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase food, drinks, milk products, canned goods and other consumables

loans.name: Alfaidhina

texts.en:
Alfaidhina is a widow with three children. All of these children are in school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She operates a food stall from home, selling to the local residents, a business she has been doing for the last two years. In addition, she does plaiting as her side job. Her aim is to own a restaurant in future and hire some employees. Alfaidhina describes theft of her goods to be a major challenge for her. Her primary customers are school children.

With the loan, she will be able to purchase rice, utensils, beans, and cooking oil.

loans.use: to purchase rice, utensils, beans, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Edwin Ricardo

texts.es:
Edwin es un hombre trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Ica, caracterizada por tener un clima cálido y gente muy acogedora, cuando tiene tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos. Con esfuerzo logró estudiar para ser técnico automotriz, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar en la universidad la carrera de Ingeniería Mecánica.
Con esfuerzo y dedicación, Edwin trabaja prestando servicios de mecánica, él dedica aproximadamente 9 horas diarias a su trabajo, atiendo entre 1 ó 2 clientes diariamente; Edwin cree que su negocio va bien debido a su experiencia y buen trato hacia sus clientes, lamentablemente no cuenta con un local propio, por lo cual tiene que alquilar uno para realizar su trabajo. 
Edwin está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que con su ayuda podrá comprar herramientas, repuestos y podrá realizar mejoras en su taller de mecánica para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes; de esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos y cumplir su sueño de tener un local propio para su taller de mecánica y obtener una casa propia.
texts.en:
Edwin’s a hardworking man living in the city of Ica, noted for its hot climate and very welcoming people.  When he has free time he enjoys playing soccer with his friends.  With effort he managed to study to become an auto mechanic but would have liked to have studied the career of Mechanical Engineering in the university.

With effort and dedication, Edwin works providing auto repair services.  He spends about 9 hours at work daily taking care of from one to two customers per day.  Edwin thinks that he does well in his business because of his experience and the good way he treats his customers.  Unfortunately, he does not have a shop of his own so must rent one to do his work.

Edwin is very grateful to Kiva lenders because with their help he will be able to buy tools and spare parts and will be able to do some improvements to his repair shop to provide better customer service thus improving his income and reaching his dream of having his own shop and to have a house of his own.

loans.use: to buy tools and spare parts for his auto repair shop.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en: Amina is taking out another Kiva loan of 40,000 KES to establish another business selling handbags. With the loan, she wants to purchase bundles of handbags for resale. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income in the future. She is thankful to Yehu and Kiva lenders for giving her an opportunity to access loans.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of handbags for resale.

loans.name: Milagros Medalit

texts.es:
Milagros es una joven de 22 años de edad, la cual vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima caluroso, así como también se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, maíz, entre otros,  también se desarrolla la agricultura y sobre todo en esta ciudad encontramos a las Islas Ballestas y el Candelabro de Paracas, los cuales reciben infinidad de turistas en todo el año ya que son atractivos turísticos hermosos que maravillan a toda persona que los visita. Cuando Dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho hacer deporte en especial jugar vóley con sus amigas y vecinas   de su barrio, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”. Debió a los pocos recursos de sus padres ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Gastronomía.

Con mucho entusiasmo ella trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, al cual le dedica alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy conocida ya que lleva trabajando desde hace 2 años y sobre todo por la amabilidad en el trato a los clientes.

Milagros está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio como pantalones, casacas, chompas, entre otros, de esta manera ella podrá mejorar sus ingresos y también tendrá mas variedad de productos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando cada día para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”
texts.en:
Milagros is a young woman who is 22 years of age and lives in the city of Pisco, which is known for its warm climate. Pisco is developed in its agriculture, especially in its crops of cotton, corn, and other commodities. It is also in this city where one can find the Ballestas Islands and the Paracas Candelabra (a prehistoric geoglyph), which attract an infinite number of tourists throughout the year. These beautiful attractions are marveled by everyone who visits. When she has free time, Milagros enjoys playing sports, especially volleyball, with her friends and neighbors in the area. She also likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, the delicious "arroz con pato" (duck with rice). Since her parents had limited resources, Milagros was only able to complete her high school education. She would have like to have continued by studying gastronomy.

With great enthusiasm, Milagros works in her business of selling clothes. She works around 10 hours a day and is able to serve up to 30 customers in a day. Milagros believes she is doing well in her business because she is well-known. She has been in business for two years and all of her customers are treated with friendly service.

Milagros is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business such as trousers, jackets, sweaters, and other items. This will improve her earnings and enable her to have a wider variety of products. Milagros continues to strive each day to fulfill her greatest dream of having a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy trousers, jackets, sweaters, and other items.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: Maria Luisa de 40 años, ella se dedica a la venta y elavoracion de delantales tipicos echos con retasos de cortes tipicos,tambien se dedica a la elavoracion de sueteres para bebes y para damas, ella esmpeso con si propio negocio hace años, y gracias a Dios a superado año con año los abstaculos en el comercio y a aprendido mucho de todas las penas que ella a pasado,tiene bajo su responsabilidad a sus hijos que gracias al apoyo de ellos a podido salir adelante,y les a podido dar lo necesario, es por eso que esta solicitando este credito, ya que en su pensamiento esta que quiere ampliar su negocio,y de la misma manera comprar mas retasos y tela para seguir elaborando delantales y sueteres,ya que por falta de recursos economicos ella no puede surtir mas su negocio,ella espera que con este credito pueda cumplir sus metas.
texts.en: Maria Luisa, 40, has a business making and selling traditional style aprons that are made with remnants of the fabric used to make traditional Guatemalan skirts.  She also makes sweaters for women and babies.  She started her business years ago, and thanks to God she has been able to overcome year after year of obstacles in the market. She has learned a lot from all of the hardships that she has passed through.  She has children in her care, and thanks to their support she has been able to get ahead and provide for their needs.  She is requesting this loan, because she has in mind that she wants to expand her business, and so she wants to buy more remnants and fabric so that she can continue to make aprons and sweaters.  It is because she lacks financial resources that she has not been able stock up on supplies for her business. Maria Luisa hopes that with this loan, she will be able to accomplish her goals.

loans.use: to make aprons and sweaters to sell

loans.name: Calixto

texts.es:
El Sr. Calixto es de la ciudad de Pilar, es electricista tiene varios clientes en toda la ciudad, es muy reconocido por su buen trabajo y bajo precio.
El señor está acompañado, tiene una hija de 10 años que va a la escuela y su señora tiene una peluquería, en su casa propia donde también tienen salones que alquilan.
Es un señor muy honesto y trabajador y nos solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas que le ayudaran a seguir trabajando en lo que hace y seguir dando todo lo que necesita su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Calixto is from the city of Pilar. He is an electrician and has several customers throughout the city. Calixto is well-known for doing good work and charging low prices. He is married and has a 10-year-old daughter who is in school. His wife has a beauty salon in their home, but she also has salons that she rents.

Calixto is an honest and hardworking man. He is requesting a loan in order to buy tools that will help him continue working so that he can provide everything his family needs.

loans.use: to buy tools for his work.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
La  señora Rosalina está casada con el Sr. Birginio. Tienen dos hijos pequeños que  están cursando la escuela primaria.Rosalina tiene un pequeño local en el centro de la ciudad donde vende bebidas y golosinas varias.
Ella se inició hace varios años vendiendo en forma ambulante hasta que consiguió comprar su local con la ayuda de unos ahorros que tenía. Hoy día ella  es muy conocida por los turistas y personas que trabajan en el micro centro. Es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superación, tiene un espíritu jovial y emprendedor que no cabe dudas que va a llegar a conseguir todas las metas que se ha propuesto.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas, golosinas y otros, con lo cual podrá surtirse y seguir ofreciendo variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosalina is married to Sr. Birginio. They have two young children who are starting elementary school. Rosalina has a small shop in the central part of the city where she sells beverages and various candies. She started selling several years ago as a street vendor and continued to do so until she bought a shop with the help of her savings. Today she is well-known among the tourists and people work in this small centralized area.

Rosalina is a responsible person who has the drive to succeed. She also possesses a jovial and enterprising spirit. There is no doubt that she can accomplish all of the goals that she has set for herself. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy sodas, candies, and other items in order to restock her business and continue offering variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy sodas, candies, and other items.

loans.name: Diawoye

texts.fr: Monsieur Diawoye vit au Sénégal. Il s’active dans le secteur de l’aviculture depuis plusieurs années. C’est grâce  aux revenus qu’il gagne avec son activité qu’il parvient à gérer les dépenses quotidiennes au sein de son foyer. Il est marié et père de famille. Il consacre 12 heures de son  temps dans la journée à son activité. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC et sollicite un crédit de 350 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’une nouvelle bande de poussins. Son objectif est de mieux développer son activité avicole, en vue d’accroitre ses gains financiers, renforcer son épargne et enfin améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille.Son objectif futur consiste a atteindre l'indépendance financière a travers l'accroissement de ses revenus dans son activité.
texts.en:
Mr. Diawoye lives in Senegal. He has been active in the poultry farming sector for several years. Thanks to the revenues he earns from his business, he is able to manage the day-to-day expenses at home. He is married and a father with a family. He dedicates twelve hours a day to his business. 

Mr. Diawoye is a member of a U-IMCEC branch office and is requesting a loan of 350,000 francs for buying a new flock of chicks. His goal is to develop further his poultry farm with the aim of increasing his financial gains, bolstering his savings, and improving his family's food situation in the end. 

His future goal consists of achieving financial independence by growing his revenues in this business.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise

loans.name: Femme De L'avenir Group

texts.fr:
Mme KORTIMI est la représentante du groupe FEMME DE L’AVENIR. Elle est mariée et mère de quatre (04) enfants. Le plus âgé a vingt deux (22) ans et le moins âgé a quatre (04) ans. Tous les quatre enfants vont à l’école. Elle a trois (03) personnes en charge.

Mme est restauratrice depuis deux (02) ans. Elle s’approvisionne à la grande boutique de yagma. Ses clients sont essentiellement les hommes, les femmes et les enfants.

Mme veut s’acheter quatre sacs de riz, une rangée de bois.

Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne agrandir son activité et mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. KORTIMI is the representative of the group FEMME DE L’AVENIR. She is married and a mother of four children. The oldest is 22, and the youngest is 4. All four children go to school. She has three persons to support. 

Ms. KORTIMI has been a restauranteur for two years. She gets her supplies at a large store in Yagma. Her customers are essentially men, women, and children.

She wants to buy four sacks of rice and a load of wood. She wants to save her profits. Her ambition is to expand her business and take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of rice and a load of wood

loans.name: Marta Funciana

texts.es:
Marta Funciana tiene 70 años es viuda  tiene 4 hijos vive  con los hijos en el Canton Pueblo Viejo Provincia de LOs Rios. 

Ella pertenece a la ventanilla ANCHOVETA se encuentre ubicada en la parroquia Puerto Pechiche recinto Anchoveta pertenece al Canton Pueblo Viejo se dedica a labores agricolas. 

Marta se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, las compras las realiza en ventanas y las realiza en la ciudad de ventanas. El credito solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantres, y abonos la sembrar maiz. El credito le ayudado a suplir las necesidades de la familiares y de la produccion. El sueño es tener dienro para vivir bien.

Ha enfrentado desafios como la lluvia que ha dañado la siembra. En los tiempos leer los libros de historias cristianas.
texts.en:
Marta Funciana is 70 years old, a widow, and has four children. She lives with her children in the Pueblo Viejo canton in the Los Rios province.

She belongs to the ANCHOVETA group, which can be found in the parish of Puerto Pechiche in the Anchoveta district, which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo Canton. They make a living doing agricultural work.

Marta has been making a living in agriculture planting corn. She purchases and does business in the city of Ventana. She is asking for this loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, and maure to plant corn. The loan will help her provide essentials for the household and for her job. Her dream is to have money to live well.

She has faced many challenges, like the rain, which has damaged the crops. In her free time she likes to read books of Christian stories.

loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizers, and manure for planting.

loans.name: Wend Merci Group

texts.fr:
Mme AGUERA est la représentante du groupe WENDE MERCI. Elle est mariée et mère de quatre (04) enfants. Le plus âgé a vingt (20) ans et le moins âgé a trois (03) ans. Trois (03) de ses enfants vont à l’école. Elle a quatre (04) personnes en charge.

Mme est commerçante (vente de potasse) depuis douze (12) ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Guibasso. Ses clients sont essentiellement les hommes et les femmes.

Mme veut s’acheter dix (10) sacs de potasse.

Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices pour s’acheter une moto. Elle ambitionne avoir un lieu fixe et propice de stock pour l’activité et s’occuper plus de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. AGUERA is the representative of the group WENDE MERCI. She is married and a mother of four children. The oldest is 20, and the youngest is 3. Three of the children go to school. She has four persons to support. 

Ms. AGUERA has been a merchant (selling potash) for twelve years. She gets her supplies in Guibasso. Her customers are essentially men and women.

She wants to buy 10 bags of potash. 

Ms. AGUERA wants to save her profits to buy a motorbike. Her ambition is to obtain a fixed, favorable spot for her business and to take better care of her children.

loans.use: to buy 10 bags of potash

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es:
MARTHA LORENA tiene 46 años de edad es divorsiada tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo de 23 años de edad en Ventanas Provincia de Bolívar.

MARTHA LORENA es secretaria en una institucuón privada. Solicita el crédito para comprar una computadora, impresora, escritorio. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podra  comprar lo que tanta falta le hacia.

Las compras lo hara en Guayaquil. El sueño e spoder comprar una casa. En el timepo libre le gusta vender mercadería.
texts.en:
Martha Lorena is 46 years old, divorced, and has one child. She lives with her 23-year-old son in Ventanas, which is in Bolívar Province.

Martha Lorena is a secretary at a private institution. She is requesting a loan in order to buy a computer, printer, and desk. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy what she is lacking. The purchases will be made in Guayaquil. Her dream is to buy a house. In her free time, she enjoys selling merchandise.

loans.use: to buy a computer, printer, and desk.

loans.name: Margarita Eusebia

texts.es:
Margarita es una mujer muy trabajadora y entusiasta, ella tiene 65 años, es casada y vive en la ciudad de Pisco, caracterizada por sus hermosas playas y clima cálido.
Con mucho entusiasmo y dedicación, Margarita se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su pequeña bodega, ella se encuentra contenta porque le va bien en su negocio; Margarita sintió la necesidad de poner su negocio ya que su esposo a veces no puede trabajar por lo propio de la edad ya que tiene 70 años, debido a que el trabajo que eligió es muy forzoso.  
Margarita se siente muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá comprar más mercadería de trabajo, tales como gaseosas, agua mineral, huevo, leche, fideos y otros abarrotes para el abastecimiento de su bodega; de esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos y tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su esposo.
texts.en:
Margarita is a very hardworking and enthusiastic woman. She is 65 years old, married and lives in the city of Pisco, which is characterized by its beautiful beaches and warm climate.

Margarita has sold groceries from her small grocery store with a lot of enthusiasm and dedication and is happy because she has been doing well in her business. Margaria felt the need to start her own business since her husband cannot work at times because of his age, he is 70, and his work is very arduous.

Margarita is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to your help she has been able to buy more merchandize such as: sodas, mineral water, egg, milk, spaghetti, and other groceries to stock her small grocery store. This will allow her to improve her income and have a better quality of life for her husband and herself.

loans.use: buy more merchandize such as: sodas, mineral water, egg, milk, spaghetti, and other groceries to stock her small grocery store.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
La Sra. Ramona tiene 64 años, es viuda, tiene 8 hijos ya todos mayores de edad e independientes. Ramona tiene una despensa en su propia casa, y  además de eso hace macate hace más de 20 años que se dedica a esto y gracias a eso cuenta con clientela formada. Es una persona muy valorada por sus vecinos, amigos y clientes por ser una mujer muy trabajadora.
Necesita el préstamo para compra de edredones, asaderas, termos, parrillas y otros productos en general. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo de Kiva y fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
Sra. Ramona is 64 years old, widowed, and has eight grown children who are independent. She has a food pantry in her home and has also worked as a "macate" (traveling merchant) for more than 20 years. Thanks to her work, she has an established clientele. Ramona is a valuable person among her neighbors, friends, and customers because she is a hardworking woman.

She needs a loan in order to buy quilts, roasting pans, thermal containers, grills, and other general products. She is grateful for the help she has received from Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy quilts, roasting pans, thermal containers, grills, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing to resell

loans.name: Johanna Mercedes

texts.es:
Johanna Mercedes tiene 30 años es soltero tiene 1 hijo vive con el hijo de 13 años en el Canton Pueblo Viejo Provincia de Los Rios. 

Ella pertenece a la ventanilla ANCHOVETA se encuentre ubicada en la parroquia Puerto Pechiche recinto Anchoveta pertenece al Canton Pueblo Viejo se dedica a labores agricolas. 

Johana se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, las compras las realiza en ventanas y las realiza en la ciudad de ventanas. El credito solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantres, y abonos la sembrar maiz. El credito le ayudado a suplir las necesidades de la familiares y de la produccion. El sueño es tener dienro para vivir bien.

Ha enfrentado desafios como la lluvia que ha dañado la siembra. En los tiempos leer los libros de historias cristianas.
texts.en:
Johanna Mercedes is 30 years old, single, and has one child. She lives with her 13-year-old son in the canton of Pueblo Viejo, which is in Los Rios Province.

Johana is a member of the Communal Bank "Anchoveta", which is located in the parish of Puerto Pechinche, Anchoveta District, and is part of the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members engage in farm work.

Johana is a farmer who grows corn. Her purchases are conducted in the city of Ventanas. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost for planting corn. As a result, the loan will help to supply what she needs for her family and for her production. Her dream is to have money so that she can live well. Among the challenges she faces are the rains that could damage her crops.

In her free time, Johanna enjoys reading books with Christian stories.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loans.name: Mamadou

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou est un homme marié qui vit au Sénégal et évolue depuis plus de 12 ans dans le secteur du transport urbain. C’est un soutien de famille qui consacre  13 heures de son temps par jour à son activité de transporteur. Les revenus de son activité lui permettent de payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants, de supporter les charges  de dépenses quotidiennes, mais aussi de constituer une épargne pour mieux gérer le futur. Il est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC et sollicite un crédit de 250 000 prévu pour l’achat d’un moteur diésel pour son véhicule. Ce financement lui permettra de mieux rentabiliser son activité afin de pouvoir atteindre ses objectifs. Son plus grand rêve  est de devenir un grand transporteur.
texts.en:
Mr. Mamadou is a married man who  lives in Senegal. He has been working in the urban transportation sector for twelve years. He is a breadwinner who devotes thirteen hours a day to his transport business. The revenues from his business enable him to cover his children's school costs, meet his day-to-day expenses, and also build his savings in order to manager his future better. 

He is a member of a U-IMCEC branch office and is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs for buying a diesel engine for his vehicle. This financing will enable him to make his business more profitable, so as to achieve his goals. His greatest dream is to become a major transporter.

loans.use: to buy a motor for his vehicle

loans.name: Verónica

texts.es:
Verónica tiene 29 años, es soltera, vive en compañía de sus padres y su hijo Yamil, a quien cuida en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Pampas.
Estudió la carrera de Educación Inicial en una universidad local, donde aprendió todo lo necesario para salir adelante. Trabajaba en una reconocida institución educativa, pero cuando nació su hijo tuvo que dedicarse a su cuidado. Por ello, en la actualidad se encuentra sembrando papa, alverja y habas en los terrenos que le dieron sus padres, donde obtiene las cosechas que comercializa en la ciudad. Asimismo crías vacas, cerdos y ovejas, animales que también vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad. Es así, que día a día se esfuerza por mantener sus sembríos en buen estado, como también a sus animales. Ahora desea que su hijo crezca, para volver a su profesión. 

Este es su primer crédito con MFP, se siente tranquila por el apoyo que recibe, además de agradecer la confianza que depositan en ella. Promete cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual, pues no defraudará a su grupo, conformado por personas solidarias y responsables.
Verónica invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus sembríos de papa, de la variedad yúngay y amarilis.
texts.en:
Verónica is 29 years old, single and lives with her parents and son, Yamil, whom she cares for in her own home located in Pampas.

She studied Primary Education in a local university where she learned everything necessary to get ahead. She worked in a recognized school but when her son was born she dedicated herself to his care. This is why at present, Verónica works growing potatoes, peas and broad beans in the fields that her parents gave her and where she gets the crops that are later sold in the city. She also breeds cows, pigs and sheep, animals that are sold when she needs. Verónica works hard day to day to keep her crops in good state as well as her animals. She now wishes for her son to grow so that she can go back to her profession.

This is her first loan with MFP, and feels comfortable with the support that she is receiving and is grateful for the confidence invested in her. Verónica promises to meet all of her payment quotas on time since she doesn’t want to let down her communal bank that is made up of a united and responsible people.

Verónica will use the money to buy natural fertilizers to spread over her potato crops of the yúngay (similar to a yellow potato) and amarilis varieties.

loans.use: buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Fama

texts.fr: Madame Fama est une femme mariée sénégalaise qui s’active dans le commerce depuis 2008. Auparavant  elle a vécu  dans un pays africain  voisin du Sénégal mais est retourné au Sénégal    a cause de la crise qui s’évit  là-bas. Actuellement elle achète des divers en provenance de ce meme pays qu’elle revend.  Son objectif est de se  procurer des revenus qui lui permettront d’aider ses enfants au sein de son foyer.   Elle souhaite avec son financement diversifier les produits qu’elle commercialise, accroitre ses bénéfices pour mieux soutenir ses enfants dans leurs besoins extra. Son vœu futur est d’acquérir son propre magasin ou elle pourra exercer convenablement son activité de commerce et exposer ses produits.
texts.en:
Ms. Fama is a married Senegalese woman who has been active in commerce since 2008. In the past, she lived in an African country neighboring Senegal but returned to Senegal due to the crisis raging there. She currently purchases various items from this same country and resells them. 

Her goal is to bring in the revenues enabling her to help her children at home. With the financing, she wishes to diversify the products she markets and to increase her profits, so as to meet the extra needs of her children. 

Her wish for the future is to acquire her own store where she will be able to operate her business conveniently and to display her products.

loans.use: to buy soap and some karité (shea butter) to resell

loans.name: Beninwende Group

texts.fr:
Mme LIMATA est la représentante du groupe BENINWENDE. Elle est célibataire sans enfant. Elle a une (01) personne en charge.

Mme est commerçante (vente d’articles de quincailleries) depuis deux (02) ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché d’oscar. Ses clients sont essentiellement les personnes en construction.

Mme veut s’acheter vingt cinq (25) sacs de ciment.

Mme veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour agrandir son commerce. Elle ambitionne améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. LIMATA is the representative of the group BENINWENDE. She is unmarried and without children. She has one person to support. 

Ms. LIMATA has been a merchant (selling hardware items) for two years. She gets her supplies at a market in Oscar. Her customers are essentially people in the construction trades. 

She wants to buy 25 sacks of cement.

She wants to use her profits to expand her business. Her ambition is to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy 25 sacks of cement

loans.name: Cerrito Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Cerrito, se conformo en el año 2008, gracias  a que una de las miembros contactó con la asesora que también tenía un grupo en la misma zona. El grupo está en su ciclo numero 12 y con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo están saliendo adelante.
 Leonidas es la presidenta del grupo, y nos cuenta que en el trascurso de todos estos ciclos ha demostrado que puede ayudar en muchas maneras a sus compañeras.  Ella vende lencería y comenta que tiene muy buena clientela que siempre le hacen pedidos y compran sus artículos. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y con ganas de salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de lencería de todo tipo, y de esa forma poder cumplir con algunos pedidos que tiene, y también mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Women’s Committee named Cerrito was formed in 2008 thanks to one of the members who contacted an adviser that also had a group in the area. The group is in its 12th loan cycle and with a lot of sacrifice and hard work they are getting ahead.

Leonidas is the president of the group and says the previous loan cycles have shown that she can help her fellow members in many ways. She sells lingerie and says that she has a good customer base because they always make orders and buy her merchandize. She is a very hardworking person with the drive to get ahead and be someone important in life.

She needs the loan to buy all types of lingerie to meet some of the orders that she has as well as improve her income.

loans.use: buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Thioce Ouest Ps Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée depuis le 02/09/2008 . Il est composé de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et 

des quartiers environnants . Ses membres sont unis par des liens sociaux et s'activent toutes dans le petit 

commerce de détails.

Madame Fatou est une femme mariée âgée de 64 ans , et mère de 4 enfants qui sont tous à sa charge.

Elle fait du commerce par la vente de tissus et d’ustensiles. Fatou dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce 

domaine. 

Son nouveau crédit de 500000 francs lui permettra de se procurer  de la marchandise (tissus 300000, ustensiles 

de cuisines).

Les bénéfices lui permettent de payer l'alimentation de ses enfants et de payer les factures d’électricité.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on September 2, 2008. It is composed of women who live in the same district and from surrounding districts. These members are united by social ties and are all active in small-scale retail businesses. 

Ms. Fatou is a 64-years-old married woman and a mother of four children, who are all in her care.  She has a business selling fabrics and utensils. Ms. Fatou has good experience in this domain.

Her new loan of 500,000 francs will enable her to procure merchandise (fabrics 300000, kitchen utensils) 

The profits will allow her to pay for food for her children and to cover the electricity bill.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and some kitchen utensils

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El señor Julio tiene 40 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Itá, y cuenta que se dedica a la confección de ropas deportivas desde hace mas de 12 años.
El es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora y nos comenta que por medio de su trabajo ha podido ayudar a su familia y darles para los gastos del día a día. El señor Julio desea ir creciendo día a día en su trabajo y por ende seguir dando lo mejor a su familia.
El solicita el crédito para la compra telas e hilos para que de esa forma pueda seguir haciendo sus trabajos y también cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Agradece por la ayuda que esta recibiendo de Kiva y fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
Mr. Julio is 40 years old and lives in the city of Itá, he works making sports clothes, work that he has done for over 12 years.

He is a very hardworking and enterprising person and says that through his work he has been able to help his family and give them enough for their day to day expenses. Mr. Julio wishes to keep growing each day in his work and as a result to keep giving his family the best he can.

He needs the loan to buy fabrics and threads so that he can keep working and meet his customers’ orders. Mr. Julio is grateful for the help that he is receiving from Kiva and the Paraguayan foundation.

loans.use: buy fabrics and threads.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.ru: Рашид проживает в районе Яван. Ему 42 года. Он вдовец. У него шестеро детей. Он два года как занимается земледелием. Кредит берет для закупа топлива.
texts.en: Rashid lives in the Yavan region. He is 42 years old, a widower, and has six children. Rashid has been a farmer for the past two years. He is taking this loan to purchase fuel.

loans.use: to purchase fuel

loans.name: Thioce Ouest Pc 2 Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée depuis le 02/09/2008. Il est composé de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et 

des quartiers environnants.

Les membres de ce groupes sont unis par de relations sociales communes et pratique toutes le commerce de 

détails.

Yandé est une femme divorcée et mère de 4 enfants . Elle s'active dans le commerce par la vente d'objets d'arts 

et de colliers depuis presque 10 ans elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine.

Son nouveau crédit de 140000 franc lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise( colliers ,objets d'arts 

pagnes) qu'elle va revendre au détails au niveau d'un marché touristique de sa localité.

Les bénéfices réalisés l'aident dans la prise en charge alimentaire et scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on September 2, 2008. It is composed of women who live in the same district and from surrounding districts. The group members are united by common social ties and all have retail businesses. 

Yandé  is a divorced woman and a mother of four children. She has been active in selling objects of art and necklaces for nearly ten years. She has good experience in this domain. 

Her new loan of 140,000 francs will enable her to procure some merchandise: necklaces, art objects, and pagnes (the colorful cloth of western Africa) that she is going to sell retail at a tourist market in her town. 

The profits will help her to cover her children's food and schooling costs.

loans.use: to buy art objects

loans.name: Eligio

texts.es:
El Sr. Eligio de 72 años de edad, está casado con la señora Wenceslaa viven en la ciudad de Itá, ambos tienen montada una despensa en su casa, que es administrada por la Sra. Wenceslaa, mientras el Sr. Eligio tiene 3 camiones para el negocio de compra – venta de ladrillos hace mas de 30 años.
La mayor prioridad del Sr. Eligio es verles a sus hijos crecer como buenas personas y que sean alguien importante en la vida y no faltarles nada mientras que el este a sus lados.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de ladrillos, ya que tiene pedidos y desea poder cumplir con sus clientes. Agradece a la fundacion y a kiva por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Mr. Eligio is 72 years old and is married to Mrs. Wenceslaa; they live in the city of Itá. They have a small grocery store in their home that is managed by Mrs. Wenceslaa. Mr. Eligio has 3 trucks for his other business where buys and sells bricks, work that he has done for over 30 years.

Mr. Eligio’s main priority is to see his children grow as good people and that they become important people in life and that they don’t lack anything as long as he is able to be by their side.

Mr. Eligio needs the loan to buy bricks, since he has orders and wishes to meet his customers’ orders. He is grateful to the foundation and Kiva for the opportunity that he is receiving.

loans.use: buy bricks to sell.

loans.name: Gie Association Terminus Sengaz N°1 Group

texts.fr: Les cinq membres du groupe "Gie association terminus sengaz n°1", font du commerce de produits alimentaires.Elles achètent en gros et se partagent les denrées en fonction de l'apport de chacune d'entre elles.Elles habitent le même quartier et s'appuient ainsi mutuellement dans leur commerce.La plus jeune membre du groupe tient un restaurant au petit marché du quartier. La présidente (au milieu, main levée)a un souk au marché.Elle y vend divers produits et denrées alimentaires et fait des bénéfices journaliers assez importants.Elle les utilisent pour renforcer l'alimentation de sa famille et pour soutenir la formation en coiffure de sa fille cadette.Aujourd'hui, avec les revenus tirés de leurs activités, tous les membres du groupe parviennent à subvenir à leurs propres besoins. Afin de renforcer leurs fonds de commerce,elles sollicitent un pret de 250000f pour acheter des denrées alimentaires.Leur ambition est de s'engager dans le commerce en gros.
texts.en: The five members of the group "Gie association terminus sengaz no.1," are grocery traders. They buy their products wholesale and share out the groceries according to the contribution of each member. They live in the same neighborhood and they support one another with their businesses. The profits generated by their businesses enable them to meet their needs. In order to strengthen their working capital, they are seeking a loan of 250,000f to buy general groceries. Their ambition is to engage in wholesale trade.

loans.use: to buy general grocery products

loans.name: Loraine

texts.es: Loraine de 20 años de edad vive al sur de la ciudad y tiene un negocio familiar dedicado a la preparación de comidas, como fritos y comidas corrientes, su negocio nació cuando procedente del municipio de Malambo llegaron a la ciudad de Barranquilla, poco a poco han ido progresando consiguiendo clientela principalmente en los casinos de un corredor comercial ubicado en una de las principales vías interdepartamentales. En la actualidad está aplicando a un primer financiamiento porque su necesidad es crecer y para ello lograr conseguir proveedores que al comprarle en volumen y de contado, le ofrezcan un precio mejor. Esta es la razón de su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas, como aceite, cereales y tubérculos; su inversión será exitosa porque ganará descuentos que muy pronta trasladará a sus utilidades y para el beneficio de sus clientes. Su meta mas adelante es tener un local propio donde funcione un gran restaurante con diversidad de comidas propias de la región. Mientras trabaja por alcanzar sus sueños, maneja una rotación de cuentas por cobrar de 15 días y su rotación de inventarios es de cada dos días, indicadores financieros desde los cuales proyectamos su crecimiento.
texts.en: Loraine, 20, lives south of the city and has a family business preparing food, such as fried food and fast food.  Her business was born when she came from the municipality of Malambo to the city of Barranquilla.  She was gradually making progress attracting customers, mainly in the casinos located on a commercial corridor on one of the main interdepartmental routes.  Now she is applying for her first loan, because she needs to grow and to do that she needs to find suppliers from whom she can buy in volume and on a cash basis, as they offer a better price.  This is the reason for this Kiva loan, the first loan that she has taken from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use this loan to buy raw materials, such as cooking oil, cereals and tubers.  Her investment will be successful because she will get discounts that will increase her profits right away, and also benefit her customers.  Her goal for the future is to have her own place where she could operate a big restaurant, offering a variety of dishes that are specialties of the region.  While she works to achieve her dreams, she will manage a 15 day rotation of accounts receivable, and her inventory turnover will be every 2 days; these are the financial indicators from which she projects her growth.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, such as cooking oil, cereals and tubers

loans.name: Tonnere Plus Group

texts.en:
Godet is the chairman of a community bank named “Tonnere Plus” composed of 13 owners of small businesses. Its members are jointly liable for loans granted by Kiva to grow their businesses.

Godet’s main activity is selling pairs of shoes in detail. He has been a micro entrepreneur since 2001. Godet is a loyal client of the MFI HOPE RDC who has already received ten different loans and has repaid them correctly. He is planning with the next loan to increase the stock of his goods by buying thirty pairs of shoes in order to meet the high demand of his customers in his community and make more profits. Currently, Godet’s business brings in US$70 per week. His ambition is to someday open a shoe factory in his environment. His business is located mid-west of the city of Kinshasa. He is 38 years old, and married.

loans.use: : to purchase 30 pairs of shoes for resale

loans.name: Oumy

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée depuis le 02/09/2008 .il regroupe des femmes du même quartier et des quartiers 

environnants. Ses membres qui le composent sont unis par de bonnes relations sociales et ont  comme activité  

principale le  petit commerce.

Madame Oumy est une femme veuve âgée de 58 ans et mère de 8 enfants dont 3 garçons et 5 filles mariées.

Elle s'active dans le petit commerce depuis son adhésion à Caurie MF.Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce  domaine.

Son nouveau crédit de 500000lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise (tissus) pour la confection d'habits destinés à la revente.

Les bénéfices générés par son activité lui permettent de subvenir à ses besoins personnels et à renforcer ses 

épargnes au niveau du banc villageois.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on September 2, 2008. It is composed of women who live in the same district and from surrounding districts. The group members composing it are united by good social ties, and they have retail businesses as their main work. 

Ms. Oumy is a 58-year-old widow and a mother of eight children, of whom three are boys and five are girls, who are married. 

She has been active in small-scale commerce since joining the microfinance institution Caurie. She has good experience in this domain. 

Her new loan of 500,000 francs will enable her to procure some merchandise (fabrics) for making clothing to be sold. 

The profits generated from her business will enable her to support herself and bolster her savings at the banc villageois.

loans.use: to buy cloth

loans.name: Diamaguene 1 Pc1 Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée depuis le 02/09/2008 , il est composé de de femmes qui habitent le même quartier 

et des quartiers environnants.

Elles sont unies par de bonnes relations sociales et s'activent dans leur majorité dans le  petit commerce.

Mariama est une femme  mariée âgée de 39 ans et mère de 8 enfants.

Elle  fait de la restauration en même du petit commerce de tissus et de produits halieutiques depuis 12 ans .

Son nouveau crédit de 200000 lui permettra de se procurer la marchandise pré citée  et renforcer son activité 

de commerce.

Les bénéfices réalisés par son activité lui permettent de renforcer ses épargnes et d'assurer l’habillement de ses enfants. 
Mais également ils lui permettent de payer les frais scolaires de ces derniers.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on September 2, 2008. It is composed of women who live in the same district and surrounding districts. The group members are united by good social ties, and they are for the most part active in small-scale commerce. 

Oumy is a 39-year-old married women and a mother of eight children. She has been working in food service, as well as small-scale commerce selling fabrics and seafood, for twelve years. 

Her new loan of 200,000 francs will enable her to procure the previously cited merchandise and to bolster her business. 

The profits generated from her business will enable her to bolster her savings and ensure her children are clothed. Also they will enable her to cover her children's school costs.

loans.use: to buy seafood, dyed cloth, and some vegetables

loans.name: Mayra Jacqueline

texts.es:
MAYRA JACQUELINE tiene 30 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con unos familiares y con los hijos de 13 y 9 años de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

MAYRA JACQUELINE es costurera. Solicita el crédito para comprar tela, hilos, botones, sierres. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar materiales para trabajar en el taller.

Las compras lo hara en Guaranda. El sueño es poder comprarse un terreno. En el titmpo libre le gusta practicar el deporte, salir de paseo.
texts.en:
Mayra Jacqueline is thirty years old and single with two children.  She lives in Guaranda in the Bolivar Province with some relatives and her children, who are 13 and 19.

Mayra Jacqueline is a seamstress.  She is requesting a loan to buy cloth, thread, buttons and zippers.  With this loan, she will be able to buy materials for the workshop.  She will make her purchases in Guaranda.  

Her dream is to be able to buy a plot of land.  In her free time she likes to play sports and take walks.

loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, buttons, and zippers.

loans.name: Montagne Sud Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Montagne Sud est créé depuis le 28 mars 2008. Ce sous-groupe (faisant partie du banc villageois) qui est composé de vingt trois femmes qui habitent le même quartier et ont comme principales activités l'élevage et le commerce.

La responsable madame Coumba Bakhao est âgée de 55 ans; elle est mariée mère de quatre enfants deux filles et deux garçons. Elle mène une activité de petit commerce de gâteaux, sucreries et bonbons à domicile et dans les écoles du quartier, elle a une bonne expérience. Sur la photo elle est debout à droite habillée en robe rose avec un châle noir autour des épaules et a levé la main droite.

Elle achète ses produits (bonbons, sucreries.....) ou les ingrédients nécessaires pour préparer ( du jus, gâteaux,pop corn....) au marché central de la ville et revend dans les écoles et à domicile.

Elle souhaite avec son prêt acheter 2 moutons et 2 vaches qu'elle va engraisser et compte se faire beaucoup de revenus à la vente.
Elle utilise ses bénéfices soutenir son mari qui est à la retraite dans la gestion quotidienne des dépenses de sa famille et de l'éducation de ses filles.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois Montane Sud [South Mountain Banc Villageois] was created on March 28th, 2008.  This sub-group (comprising part of the banc villageois) is composed of twenty-three women who all live in the same neighbouhood and who run businesses in retail and raising livestock.

The woman in charge, Coumba Bakhao, is 55 years old; she is a married mother of four children, two girls, and two boys.  She has had a good experience running a small business selling cakes, sweets, and candies from home and in the schools of the neighbourhood.   In the photo, she is standing to the right dressed in a pink robe with a black shawl around her shoulders raising he right hand.

She buys stock (candies, confections, etc.) or the necessary ingredients for preparing goods(such as juice, cakes, popcorn, etc.) at the central market of the town, and then resells them in schools and out of her home. 
With this loan, Coumba hopes to buy 2 sheep and 2 cows that she will fatten, expecting to earn a large profit off of their resale.

She uses her profits to help her retired husband in managing the everyday expenses of her family and the education of her girls.

loans.use: Acheter de la matière premier et des ingrédients pour préparer des gâteaux destinés à la vente

loans.name: Alexandra Azucena

texts.es:
Alexandra Azucena tiene 42 años es viuda  tiene 4 hijo vive con los padres en el Canton Pueblo Viejo Provincia de Los Rios. 

Pertenece a la ventanilla ANCHOVETA se encuentre ubicada en la parroquia Puerto Pechiche recinto Anchoveta pertenece al Canton Pueblo Viejo se dedica a labores agricolas. 

Alexandra se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, las compras las realiza en ventanas y las realiza en la ciudad de ventanas. El credito solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantres, y abonos la sembrar maiz. 

El credito le ayudado a suplir las necesidades de la familiares y de la produccion. El sueño es comprar mas terrenos para aumentar la produccion Ha enfrentado desafios como los precios del maiz en el mercado estan muy bajos. En los tiempos le gusta ver la television.
texts.en:
Alexandra Azucena is a 42-year old widow with four children. She lives with her parents in Pueblo Viejo in the Los Rios Province of Ecuador.

She belongs to the Anchoveta Community Bank which is located in Puerto Pechiche parrish in Pueblo Viejo. The bank supports various agricultural activities. 

Alexandra is a corn farmer. She purchases her supplies and sells her goods in the city of Ventanas. She will use the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and compost to plant her corn.

The loan will help her provide for her families' needs and increase production. She hopes to purchase more land, so that she can grow more. Her biggest challenge is the low price of corn offered to her at the market. In her free time she likes to watch television.

loans.use: compra de semillas, fertilizantres, y abonos

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr:
Ce Banc villageois a été crée en 2004, il regroupe des femmes issus du même quartiers et des quartiers 

environnants.

Ces membres sont unis par de bons liens sociaux et pratiquent toutes le petit commerce de détails.

Madame Aminata est une femme mariée âgée de 55 ans et mère de 2 filles et 4 garçons.

Elle pratique le petit commerce par la vente de chaussures,d’encens,et de tissus. Elle dispose d'une bonne 

expérience pour avoir pratiquée son activité depuis longtemps.

Son nouveau crédit de 225000 lui permettra de se procurer du parfum en sus de la marchandise pré citée.

les bénéfices générés lui permettront d'assurer l'habillement de ses enfants et de régler ses besoins financiers.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created in 2004. It is composed of women from the same district and surrounding districts. The group members are united by good social ties, and they all have small retail businesses. 

Ms. Aminata is a 55-year-old married women and a mother of two girls and four boys. She works in small-scale commerce selling shoes, incenses, and fabrics. She has good experience for having worked in her business for a long time. 

Her new loan of 225,000 francs will enable her to procure perfume, in addition to the previously cited merchandise. 

The profits generated from her business will enable her to ensure her children are clothed and to meet her financial needs.

loans.use: to buy shoes, incense, and cloth

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 38 años, está casado con  Sonia de 30 años, el es macatero hace más de diez años, además de eso  su esposa es artesana (fábrica de sobrecamas), la pareja tiene un hijo por el que luchan incansablemente.
Pedro es muy sacrificado debido a que su mamá es madre soltera y él es el mayor entre sus hermanos, primeramente desde muy joven empezó a trabajar en la artesanía, fabricando hamacas a un vecino, después cuando cumplió la mayoría de edad empezó a vender sus propios productos en la capital del país.
Pedro necesita el crédito para la compra de productos como ser sabanas y frazada con lo que podrá surtirse y tener variedad que ofrece.
texts.en:
Pedro is 38 years old and married to Sonia, who is 30. He has been a street vendor for more than ten years. In addition, his wife is an artisan (she makes bedspreads). The couple has a son and they work tirelessly to help him get ahead.

Pedro is very self-sacrificing since his mother is a single mother and he is the oldest of his brothers and sisters. He first began working in crafts when he was very young, making hammocks for a neighbor. Later when he became an adult he began selling his own products in the capital of the country.

Pedro needs a loan to purchase items such as sheets and blankets so he can stock up and have a variety of products to offer.

loans.use: to buy sheets and blankets.

loans.name: Santessou Pc 1 Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée en 2004 et il est composé de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et des 

quartiers environnants.

Elles sont unies par des relations sociales communes et pratique dans leur majorité le petit commerce de détails.

Madame Fatou est une femme veuve âgée de 55 ans et mère de 10 enfants dont 5 garçons et 5 filles.

Elle fait du commerce par le biais de la transformation des fruits , légumes céréales depuis 10 ans.

Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine.

Son nouveau crédit de 195000 lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise pré cité pour la transformation de 

ses produits qu 'elle va revendre au détails au niveau de son quartier.

les bénéfices réalisés par son activité  lui permettent de payer l'alimentation et les factures d’électricité pour sa famille.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created in 2004. It is composed of women from the same district and surrounding districts. The group members are united by common social ties, and they for the most part have small retail businesses. 

Ms. Fatou is a 55-year-old widow and a mother of ten children, five boys and five girls. She has been doing commerce by means of processing fruit & vegetables and grains, for ten years. She has good experience in this domain. 

Her new loan of 195,000 francs will enable her to procure the previously cited merchandise for producing her products, which she is going to sell retail in her district.

The profits generated from her business will enable her to pay for food and cover the electricity bills for her family.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, and grains

loans.name: Regulo Guillermo

texts.es:
REGULO GUILLERMO es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 16, 10 y 22 años de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

REGULO GUILLERMO es funcionario Público. Solicita el crédito para pagar de la matrícula de la universidad y comprar cuadernos, pasajes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar la educación de la hija.

Los trámites lo hará en Guaranda.

El sueño es poder mejorar la forma de vuda de la familia.

En el tiempo libre le gusta trabajar en la casa .
texts.en:
Regulo Guillermo is married with three children.  He lives in Guaranda in the Bolivar Province with his spouse and his children, who are 10, 16 and 22 years old.  

Regulo Guillermo is a public official.  He is requesting a loan to pay for college tuition and textbooks, along with travel expenses.  With this loan he will be able to improve his daughter's eucation.  These transactions will take place in Guaranda.  

His dream is to be able to improve his family's lifestyle.  In his free time, he likes to work in his home.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition and books as well as travel expenses.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
El señor Hugo tiene 40 años de edad, está casado con la señora Romilia de 36 años, tienen 3 hijos, uno de ellos estudia en la universidad y los otros dos  cursan estudios en la secundaria.
Hugo se dedica a la compra y venta de madera hace mas de 5 años a aserraderos de la zona y a particulares, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposa quien posee una despensa ubicada en su domicilio donde surte a sus vecinos y a ocasionales clientes. El además tiene plantaciones de caña dulce que comercializa luego de un año de su plantación que le ayudan en la manutención de su familia.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de madera, lo cual venderá y de esa forma seguirá ayudando a su familia, como lo ha venido haciendo.
texts.en:
Hugo, 40, is married to Romilia, 36, and they have 3 children.  One of their children is attending a university, and the other 2 are in high school.  

Hugo has had a business buying and selling wood  to the sawmills in the area, and to individuals, for more than 5 years .  He relies on the help of his wife, who has a store located in their home where she stocks goods that she sells to her neighbors and to other customers who drop in from time to time.
In addition, he grows sugar cane that he sells a year after he plants it, which helps him to support his family.

He is requesting a loan to buy wood that he will sell.  In this way, he will continue to help his family, as he has been doing.

loans.use: to buy wood to sell

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 37 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она арендует торговую точку, где продает женское нижнее белье и детскую обувь. В этой области она имеет богатый опыт. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Madina lives in the Shahrituz region. She is 37 years old. She is married, with three children. She has been renting a stand where she sells women's underwear and children's shoes. She has a long experience in this line of work. She is taking out a loan in order to increase her sales volume.

loans.use: to buy children's summer shoes and women's underwear [for resale].

loans.name: Shomurod

texts.ru: Шомурод житель района Шахритус. Ему 52 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его жена учительница. Сам он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. В этой области он десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Shomurod lives in the Shahrituz Region. He is 52 years old. He is married, with three children. His wife is  a school teacher. Shomurod makes a living by raising cattle. He has been in this line of work for 10 years. He is taking out a loan to buy bulls and calves.

loans.use: to buy bulls and calves.

loans.name: Diamaguene 2 Ps Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée depuis le 02/09/2008. Il est composé de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et des quartiers environnants.
Les membres de ce groupe sont unis par des relations sociales communes et s'activent toutes dans le petit commerce.
 Marie Odile est une femme veuve âgée de 42 ans et mère de 2 garçons de 15 et 13 ans tous à l'école.
Elle s'active dans le commerce depuis bientôt 10 ans . Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine.
Son nouveau crédit de 220000 francs lui permettra d'acheter des tissus et des bijoux qu'elle va revendre au détails.
les bénéfice de son activité lui permettent de prendre en charge les frais scolaire de ses enfants et de payer de la nourriture avant de subvenir à ses besoins personnel.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois has been created on September 2, 2008. It is composed of women living in or around the same neighborhood. The group members belong to the same community and all work as vendors.

Marie Odile is a 42-year old widow. She is the mother of two boys, 15 and 13 years of age, both of whom are in school. She has been working as a vendor for almost 10 years. She has plenty of experience in this line of work.
Her new loan of 220,000 West African francs will allow her to buy fabric and jewelry for retailing. 
Her revenues will allow her to cover the education expenses of her children and to pay for food, along with providing for her personal needs.

loans.use: to buy fabric and jewlery.

loans.name: Maria Alexandra

texts.es:
MARIA ALEXANDRA tiene 29 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

MARIA ALEXANDRA es empleada doméstica. Solicita el crédito para comprar una lapto. Con la ayuda del crédito ayudae a los hijos para que puedan realizar los trabajos para la escuela.
 
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es darles los estudios.

 El sueño es poder tener trabajo siempre para poder reunir y darle los estudios a los dos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Maria Alexandra is 29 years old, single and has two children. She lives with them in the city of Guaranda, Province of Bolívar.

Maria Alexandra is a housekeeper. She needs a loan to buy a laptop. With the loan she will be able to help her children so that they can do their school work.

The challenge that she faces is giving her children an education.

Maria Alexandra’s dream is to always have enough work to be able to have enough and give both of her children an education. In her free time she enjoys playing with her children.

loans.use: buy a laptop.

loans.name: Danilo Alexander

texts.es:
DANILO ALEXANDER tiene 39 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.
