Su expectativa es Mantener el negocio en su casa ya que donde se encuentra cuenta con bastante clientela y seguir creciendo con diversos productos. 

Solicito el préstamo para productos básico de la pulpería tales como avena, pan, arroz, azúcar, café, jabón, y productos alusivos al día de las madres, todo lo necesario para surtir su negocio con el objetivo de aumentar sus ventas para obtener mas ganancias, su planes futuros es solicitar un nuevo préstamo para terminar de mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Hannah is married and a merchant in the grocery store business.  She is originally from Granada and is a mother of two children aged 4 and 6 who attend school.  She started working at the age of 9 with her mother and sister.  They would work as street vendors selling enchiladas, fried pastries, etc. and in this way she began to gain experience.  She continued working once she got married and then her mother became ill and passed away.  She decided to keep working with her sister.  With time, she saved enough to open up her own business which is a small grocery store.  She has other income since her husband receives severance pay from his job and contributes to the business and household expenses. She also sells Avon cosmetics and clothing to help her income.  Her hope is to maintain her business in her home because in this location she has many customers and to continue growing with a variety of products. 

She is requesting this loan to buy basic products for the small grocery story such as oats, bread, rice, sugar, coffee, soap, and Mother’s Day products - everything necessary to stock her business with the objective of increasing her sales so as to have greater earnings.  Her plans for the future are to request a loan to improve her home’s infrastructure.

loans.use: to buy basic products for her small grocery story such as oats, bread, rice, sugar, coffee, soap, and Mother’s Day products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy equipment for her call center business.

loans.name: Munkhbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Munkhbayar, 45, works as support personnel at a construction company. He has been doing this job since 2007. He lives with his wife and his four children in his small old house, which is in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. 

He bought his plot of the land and house in 2007 and he never made any repairs or renovation to his house. He decided to make repairs to his old house. At first, he planned to insulate the walls of his house because it becomes very cold inside the house without the wall insulation, and it costs too much money for the smoky coal to get the inside of the house warm. Also, it is the worst influence on the air of the city. 

Although Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world, it is one of the most polluted countries in the world. This is due to the long and cold winters, where temperatures frequently go below -40C (-40F) even in the cities.  Also, in summer, many parts of the country are extremely cold and are known to have snow storms.  Both homes and nomadic tents burn a lot of fuel and emit huge amounts of pollution every night from families just trying to stay warm.  

In response to this, Credit Mongol offers Green Loans to their clients to make home improvements that reduce heat loss and improve heating systems.  We believe that together we can decrease pollution and the harmful effects it has on the environment and Mongolians' health. The loan Mr. Munkhbayar is taking will used to buy the building materials to make repairs and to insulate the walls of his house to reduce heat loss and emissions.

loans.use: to buy the building materials to make repairs and to insulate the walls of his house to reduce heat loss and emissions.

loans.name: Byambatsog

texts.en:
Byambatsog, 34, runs a taxi. He lives with his wife and his three children in a ger, a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent, which is in Ulaanbaatar's ger district, an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity. 

He has been running his business since 2010 and now it is the main income source of his family. Her wife has been unemployed for a long time and she wants to start a new business. 

This time Byambatsog is requesting a loan to repair his taxi, which is damaged. He believes his business will be good after the repair.

loans.use: To repair his taxi.

loans.name: Bat-Erdene

texts.en:
Bat-Erdene, 39, drives a taxi around the districts of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He lives with his wife and his two children in his house, which is in the Ulaanbaatar ger district, an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity. 

He has been running his business for 1.6 years and now it is the main income source of his family. This time he is taking a loan to repair his taxi because it is old and needs repair.

loans.use: To repair his taxi.

loans.name: Rahiema

texts.en:
This is Rahiema, 32, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines. Single, she manages her household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Rahiema operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Rahiema hopes to be able to expand soon. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: G.s. En Dios Confiamos Group

texts.es: G.S  EN Dios Confiamos  sus integrantes  zenovia,  Domitila, Lilliam. Las cuales tiene actividad económica diferentes , a pesar de todo ellas se han podido comprender, ayudar mutuamente, para ser responsable y tener buenas relaciones como grupo,  senovia  su actividad es una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación,  la cual la ha podido sacar adelante  e invertirle gracias al  apoyo que fundación les brinda con los financiamiento ella necesita el dinero para la compra de  productos  como:   galletas, fósforos, arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, jabón  entre otros.
texts.en:
The members of the En Dios Confiamos solidarity group are Zenovia, Domitila and Lilliam. They all have different businesses, but despite this they have been able to understand and help one another to be responsible and work well together as a group. Zenovia runs a small grocery store in her house. This has helped her get ahead, and she has invested in her business thanks to the financial support given to her by the foundation. 

She has requested this loan to buy products such as cookies, matches, rice, sugar, oil, detergents and soap, among others.

loans.use: To buy cookies, matches, rice, sugar, oil, detergents and soap, among others.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is married and has four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

For the past three years, she has operated a retail shop business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She dreams of expanding her business to a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase sacks of sugar, beans, maize and rice. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of sugar, beans, maize and rice.

loans.name: Ilhomjon

texts.ru: Илхомчон добрый и воспитанный человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет троих сыновей. Жена работает в салоне маникюрщицей. Более 12 лет Илхомчон занимается купле- продажей колбасных изделий, сыр и сосиски на центральном рынке. Товар привозит сами поставщики разных фирм города. Является собственником бизнеса, начинал с мелкой продажи и за несколько лет достиг таких хороших результатов. Илхомчон запрашивает займ в размере 10000 сомони и намерен использовать его для закупа колбасных изделий. Он надеется на вашу доброту и щедрость.
texts.en:
Ilhomjon is a kind and civil person, he's married and has three children. Ilhomjon's wife works as a manicurist in a beauty salon. For the past twelve years, Ilhomjon has run a business focused on buying and selling various meats, cheese and sausages on the city's central market. The city's suppliers deliver it to the market themselves. 
Ilhomjon began his business with small sales and achieved some very impressive results in the following years. 
He's asking for a loan of 10,000 somoni in order to purchase meat products. Ilhomjon is hoping for your help and charity.

loans.use: to purchase meat products.

loans.name: Lorena Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Lorena, es ama de casa y comerciante se dedica a la venta de pasteles y tortas de cumpleaños, está casada y es madre de un hijo. Ella aprendió el oficio de maestra pero de ejercer esta carrera ya que al morir su madre no tenía a nadie quien el cuidara a su hijo. Pero busco otra manera de cómo generar ingresos para aportar con los gastos del hogar y entonces de dedico a vender pasteles, mientras su esposo se dedica a ser chofer de carga pesada. 
Ella solicita un crédito Kiva para comprar una batidora para hacer sus pasteles y repostería. Este crédito le ayudara en gran manera pues podrá agilizar el proceso de producción para cumplir con los pedidos y darse a conocer ya que desea convertir su negocio en un Pastelería Famosa donde asistan bastantes clientes y salir adelante siendo una empresaria exitosa en la ciudad de Granada.
texts.en:
Lorena is a housewife, and also operates a business selling pastries and birthday cakes. She is married and has one son. She studied to become a teacher and started down that career path, but when her mother died, she did not have anyone to care for her son while she was away at work. By baking and selling cakes and other baked goods, she found another way to generate income and help with household expenses, while at the same time being present in her son’s life. Her husband works as a heavy load driver.

Lorena is requesting a Kiva loan in order to purchase an electric mixer for making her cakes and pastries. The support from this loan will be of great help to her as it will allow her to streamline and speed up her baking process, helping her to complete more customer orders in a shorter amount of time. She hopes, in time, to turn her bakery into a famous bakery that is well known and serves a large customer base, making her a successful businesswoman in the city of Granada.

loans.use: to purchase an electric mixer for making cakes and pastries.

loans.name: Baasansuren

texts.en:
Baasansuren is 32 years old and he lives with his wife and his son in a ger, a Mongolian traditional nomadic yurt, in his brother’s plot of the land. 

He works as a watchman in a private company. His wife works as an accountant in other company. He owns a small plot of the land close to Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He wants to build a small family house there, so he is requesting a loan to buy the building materials to build his family house. He hopes that his family will have their house next year.

loans.use: To buy the building materials to build his family house.

loans.name: Tungalagtamir

texts.en:
Tungalagtamir, 25, works as a driver. He does not own a home and now he lives with his wife in a rental house. He has been doing his job since 2009 and his wife works as a railway woman. 

Tungalagtamir moved out from his parents house three years ago and he never had his own capital. Recently, he decided to purchase a small plot of land in a rural area that is close to the city. But he lacks enough money. He is taking a loan to cover the cost of his purchasing the plot of the land for his family.

loans.use: To cover the cost of his purchasing a plot of the land for his family.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
El  Sr.  Guadalupe tiene 59 años de edad, él nos cuenta que trabajo desde muy joven y que no teme a ningún desafío y trabajo. Guadalupe se dedica a la venta de leche ya que tiene un tambo, además de eso se dedica a la venta de artículos de mercería como ser de prendas y zapatos.
El comenta que luego de mucho esfuerzo  logro  comprar  para su moto carro para el reparto de la leche de vaca y de esa forma poder facilitar su trabajo. El Sr. Guadalupe cuenta con una gran clientela; y comenta quuecon este trabajo logro mejorar su vivienda y darle la educación necesaria a sus hijos.
El necesita de este crédito para la compra ropas con lo cual podrá abastecerse y seguir vendiendo sus productos.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is 59 years old. He told us he has been working since he was very young and that there are neither challenges nor jobs that can scare him. Owing a milking yard, Guadalupe sells milk; on top of this he also sells haberdashery products such as clothes and shoes.
He says that with great efforts he succeeded in buy a vehicle to distribute his cow milk, in order to make his job easy. Guadalupe can count on many customers, and he says that thanks to his job he has succeeded in making improvements to his house and in providing his children with the mandatory education.
The reason he needs this loan is to purchase clothes to stock-up his inventory, in order to keep on selling his products.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Don Pedro habitante del departamento de Granada, casado, se dedica al comercio tiene un taller de enderezado y pintura para carros. Inicio su negocio de manera familiar primero como ayudante  hace 15 años, luego con el tiempo que llevaba trabajando con su familia él se sentía que ya tenía experiencia para trabajar solo y decide poner su propio negocio a la edad de 28 años.
 Actualmente en su negocio cuenta con 2 trabajadores y un aprendiz a quienes les paga semanal, su servicio lo brinda  en la misma comunidad y en los alrededores de Granada ya que tiene bastantes clientes por su experiencia, es reconocido por el buen trabajo que realiza, no cuenta con otros ingresos depende de su taller de enderezado, su expectativa es seguir con su creatividad, entregar buen trabajo y ser puntual para mantener siempre a sus clientes. 
Solicito el préstamo para compra de  pinturas y  herramientas para dar por terminados trabajos que tiene pendientes el cual le ayudara porque entregara su trabajo en el tiempo solicitado, con el objetivo de obtener más ganancias y mejorar su negocio.
Sus planes futuros es comprar su propio terreno y construir su propia casa para asegurar el futuro de su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro lives in the administrative division of Granada. He is married, and has an auto bodywork and car paint workshop. He started in the family business 15 years ago as an assistant. Over time working with his family he felt that he had enough experience to work alone, and set up his own business when he was 28 years old.

His business currently has two employees and an apprentice, who he pays on a weekly basis. He offers his services in the local community and the areas around Granada. He has many customers due to his experience, and is well-known for the good work he does. He has no other income and depends on his auto bodywork shop. He hopes to continue with the business, delivering good work and being punctual to keep his customers.

He has requested this loan to buy paint and tools to finish some pending jobs he has. This will help him as he will be able to deliver his work on time, which will give him more income and help his business.

In the future he hopes to buy his own plot of land and build a house to provide for his family’s future.

loans.use: To buy paint and tools.

loans.name: Antonio Angel

texts.es:
Antonio es un hombre de 46 años, soltero, natural de la ciudad de Ica, caracterizada por su clima cálido y gente acogedora; Antonio gusta de escuchar música en sus ratos libres, así también le gusta cocinar uno de sus platos favoritos como es el "Picante de Pallares".
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Antonio trabaja en su negocio de venta de juguetes, él dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender entre 30 a 35 clientes, él cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a que ofrece buenos precios y tiene una muy buena atención hacia sus clientes. 
Antonio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de más mercadería (juguetes) para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera poder obtener mejores ingresos, y en futuro no muy lejano Antonio sueña con tener su propia tienda y convertirse en uno de los mayores distribuidores de juguetes, mejorando de esta manera su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Antonio is 46 years of age and single. He is from the city of Ica, which has a warm climate and welcoming population. Antonio likes to listen to music in his spare time, as well as cooking one of his favorite dishes, Picante de Pallares (a spicy butterbean stew).


Hard-working and dedicated, Antonio works selling toys. He spends approximately 12 hours each day in his business, and can handle between 30 and 35 customers. He thinks that his business does well because he offers good prices and has very good customer service.

Antonio is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to their help he will be able to buy more merchandise (toys) to supply his business. This will allow him to generate better income. In the near future Antonio wants to have his own store, becoming one of the largest toy distributors and improving his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise (toys) to supply his business.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret still practices farming and the business is doing well. She is applying for her second loan from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loan successfully. Margaret will use the loan to pay school fees for her son. 

She will use the anticipated profit from the farming business to buy seedlings and fertilizer to boost the farming business which will help her service her loan successfully. 

Her hopes and dreams are to educate her children up to university level and to improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her son.

loans.name: Rolando Alcides

texts.es:
Rolando tiene 45 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa la ciudad de Pucallpa se encuentra en la selva peruana, en Pucallpa encontramos mucha flora y fauna variada, es un lugar donde podemos apreciar la belleza de la naturaleza y sobre todo despejarnos del ruido. Rolado vive al lado de su esposa y juntos tienen 4 hijos, cuyas edades comprenden 3, 7,7 y 10 añitos, son su adoración y sobre todo su motor para seguir adelante, aunque en ocasiones le sacan canas verdes. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres solo tuvo estudios primarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar ingeniería mecánica.

Con mucho entusiasmo rolando trabaja en su negocio de duplicados de llave, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas al día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo con calidad.

Rolando está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más llaves para poder realizar su trabajo, de esta manera el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una ferretería”.
texts.en:
Rolando is 45 years of age and lives in the city of Pucallpa. Pucallpa is located in the Peruvian jungle. Pucallpa has lots of varied flora and fauna, and is a city where you can appreciate the beauty of nature and get away from the noise. 


Rolando lives with his wife, and they have four children aged three, seven, seven and ten. He adores his children and they are what motivate him to get ahead, although sometimes they drive him crazy. In his spare time he likes to play football with his neighborhood friends, and to eat one of his favorite dishes, delicious rice with chicken. 


Due to his parents’ scarce financial resources he only went to primary school, but he would have liked to study mechanical engineering.


Rolando works in his key-copying business with lots of enthusiasm. He spends approximately 10 hours per day at work, and thinks that his business does well because he is very friendly to his customers and, above all, because he provides a quality service.


Rolando is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy more keys for his business. This will enable him to improve his income and continue fighting to realize his biggest dream, which is to own a hardware store.

loans.use: To buy merchandise (keys).

loans.name: Orlando Adrian

texts.es:
Orlando es un hombre de 57 años, natural de la ciudad de Chincha, es casado y tiene 3 hijos, Orlando es un hombre de familia que con la comprensión y ayuda de su esposa, han dedicado sus esfuerzos en sacar adelante a su hijos y  hacerlos profesionales, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar noticias y en ocasiones le gusta preparar su platillo favorito el Arroz Chaufa. 
Con mucho entusiasmo y empeño, Orlando se dedica a su negocio de alquiler de una maquina mezcladora para construcción; asimismo, brinda servicio de taxi y apoya en la venta de bisutería del negocio de su esposa, él dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 20 clientes, Orlando cree que su negocio marcha bien por el buen servicio y amabilidad que brinda a sus clientes. 
Orlando se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá abastecer su nuevo negocio de una pequeña tienda, con productos de primera necesidad, tales como tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, etc.; de esta manera podrá incrementar sus ingresos y con ello espera poder comprar un vehículo propio que pueda servirle para trabajar, y en un futuro no muy lejano desea poder terminar la construcción de su hogar.
texts.en:
Orlando is a 57-year-old gentleman and a native of the city of Chincha. He is married and has three children. Orlando is a family man who understands and helps his wife. Through their efforts, they have been able to move their children forward and see them become professionals. In his free time, he enjoys listening to the news and occasionally preparing his favorite dish -- fried rice.

With great enthusiasm and effort, Orlando engages in his business of renting out a cement mixer for construction jobs. In addition, he provides taxi services and helps with his wife's trinket business. Orlando works approximately 12 hours a day and is able to serve up to 20 customers. He believes his business is doing well because of the friendly service he provides to his customers.

Orlando is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. He thanks them for the assistance they have provided so that he can start a new business, a small store. Orlando plans to buy basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, oil, and other items so that he can increase his income. With his earnings, he hopes to buy his own vehicle that he can use for work. In the distant future, he wants to finish the construction of his home.

loans.use: to buy basic necessity products for opening a general store.

loans.name: Nooretet

texts.en:
Nooretet is 39 years old and married. She supports a family of five children. She is a beans farmer and has been in this business for the last 12 years with a monthly income of KES 17,000. 

She is requesting a second loan of KES 100,000 from KADET Ltd., and this will facilitate her in preparation of the farm and purchase of fertilizers.

She hopes to use anticipated profits to expand her farm and reinvest. Her future dreams are to improve the family's living standards and educate her children

loans.use: to prepare the farm and purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy summer season clothes and shoes from China to resell.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a mother of three children, one of whom still attends school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past seven years, she has operated a food stall business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income in the future. 

Fatuma is requesting KES 30,000 to purchase sacks of maize, rice, beans, and cooking fat oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of maize, rice, beans, and cooking oil.

loans.name: David Rolando

texts.es:
DAVID ROLANDO tiene 22 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con la madre en Guaranda Provincia de Bolivar.

DAVID ROLANDO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, cebada, trigo, habas también se dedica a la cría de pollos, cerdos.

Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, cerdos y ganado. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los animales. 

El desfío al que se enfrenta es el transporte y vías de comunicación. 

El sueño es poder tener un vehículo propio.En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boly y disfrutar de la música clásica y dedicarse a la construcción.
texts.en:
David Rolando is 22 years old, he is single, he has no children and he lives with his mother in Guaranda, in the Bolivar province.

David Rolando is a farmer, and he plants maize, barley, wheat and broad beans; he also breeds chickens and pigs.

He is requesting a loan to buy chickens, pigs and cattle; thanks to this loan he will be able to buy the animals he needs.

The main challenges he has to face are transpiration and communications.

He dreams of owing a vehicle of his own. In his free time he like playing volleyball, listening to classical music and engaging in DYI.

loans.use: To buy chickens, pigs and cattle.

loans.name: Madrid Lorena

texts.es:
Madrid es una mujer de 46 años, viven en la ciudad de Ica, es casada y tiene un hijo de 18 años, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir momentos gratos con su familia y en ocasiones los consiente preparando su platillo favorito el "Arroz con Pollo"; con mucho empeño Madrid terminó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Derecho.
Con mucho esfuerzo y entusiasmo, Madrid trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa y calzado; asimismo, cuenta con un negocio de alquiler de mototaxis (02), ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 6 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 9 clientes, ella cuenta con la fidelidad de sus clientes debido a su carisma y buena atención.
Madrid se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento y reparación general que necesitan sus mototaxis para que se encuentren operativas y puedan ser utilizadas para su alquiler; de esta manera podrá incrementar sus ingresos y en poco tiempo espera poder tener un local propio para la venta de ropa y calzado y con ello mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Madrid is 46 years old, and lives in the city of Ica. She is married and has a son who is 18 years old. In her free time, she likes to spend time with her family and cook her favorite dish, “Arroz con Pollo” (Chicken with Rice). Through much hard work, Madrid was able to complete her secondary studies, but was unable to continue her education at the university level, though she would have liked to study law.

Madrid is an enthusiastic, hardworking woman who makes a living running a clothing and shoe sales business. She also operates a motor-taxi rental business, and dedicates about six hours per day to her business. In that time, she can attend up to nine clients. Her customers are faithful to her, since she treats them well and is very kind and charismatic.

Madrid is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their support, and as a result of the support from this loan, she has been able to repair and do general maintenance on her motor-taxis to keep them running smoothly for her clients to rent. She hopes that this steady maintenance and care will help her to increase her income and, in the near future, and allow her to purchase her own store space for her clothing and shoe sales business. She hopes, as she expands her businesses, to improve her quality of life and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to repair and maintain her motor-taxis so that they function properly and can be rented out to clients.

loans.name: Mario Santiago

texts.es: El Sr Mario Santiago  inicio su negocio hace varios años con un poco de capital propio , esta iniciativa de trabajo la adquirió por la necesidad de tener un medio para poder mantener a su familia, en la actualidad el ha adquirido experiencia  en la elaboraracion de los diferentes platillos que ofrece a su cliente, lo cual le ha ayudado a obtener muy buenas reputación, a incrementar su venta  por su servicio, el está solicitando el refinanciamiento para compra productos necesario para la elaboración de diferentes platillos. Como: arroz, tomates, chiltomas, carne de res y de pollo, sal, condimentos, utensilios de cocina entre otros.
texts.en:
Mario Santiago started his business several years ago with a small amount of his own capital. He did this because he needed a way to support his family. Since then he has gained experience in preparing the various different dishes he offers his customers. This has earned him a very good reputation, as well as allowing him to increase his sales. 

He is requesting this loan to buy products that he needs to make his different dishes, such as rice, tomatoes, sweet peppers, beef and chicken, salt, seasoning and kitchen utensils, among others.

loans.use: To buy rice, tomatoes, sweet peppers, beef and chicken, salt, seasoning and kitchen utensils, among others.

loans.name: Ana Bell

texts.es:
Ana tiene 44 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Santiago, Ica, Perú. El distrito de Santiago se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, además en él se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de uva, esparrago, algodón, paprika, entre otros. Ana vive al lado de sus 5 hijos  cuyas edades comprenden 27, 16, 12, 10 y 5, a los cuales quiere muchísimo y a quienes saca adelante sola ya que el padre de sus hijos la abandono y ella se convirtió en padre y madre para ellos,  el mayor de sus hijos siempre la apoya, sobre todo cuando ella sale a trabajar ya que la ayuda con el cuidado de sus hermanos menores.  Cuando tiene un tiempo libre a Ana le gusta ver televisión y en ocasiones preparar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima “Carapulcra con sopa seca”. Ella solo estudio hasta el primer grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Medicina.

Con mucho entusiasmo Ana trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, dulces, golosinas, entre otros, ella le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque cocina muy rico.

Aba esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar bebidas gaseosas, golosinas, agua mineral, entre otros, de esta manera ella podrá tener más productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y así podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño: Darle una buena educación a sus hijos y tener una vivienda mas grande”.
texts.en:
Ana, 44, lives in the district of Santiago, Ica, Peru, which is known for its warm climate.  The district is also characterized by development in agriculture, especially the cultivation of grapes, asparagus, cotton, and paprika among other crops.  Ana lives with her five children whose ages are 27, 16, 12, 10, and 5.  She loves them very much and helps them get ahead on her own since the father of her children abandoned her.  She became a father and a mother for them.  Her eldest child always supports her especially when she goes to work and helps her take care of the younger children.  When she has free time, Ana likes to watch television and occasionally prepare her favorite dishes one of which is the delicious “Carapulcra con sopa seca”.  She only attended school up until the first year of high school, but she would have liked to study Medicine. 

Ana works with great enthusiasm at her business of selling food, sweets, and snacks among other things.  She works at her job for about 8 hours a day and can attend up to 20 customers a day.  She believes she does well at her business because she is very kind to her customers and mostly because she is a great cook.  

Ana is very grateful with the loans from Kiva - thanks to the help they have given her she will be able to buy soft drinks, snacks, and mineral water among other things.  In this way she will be able to have more products to offer her customers and will be able to keep working to realize her biggest dream: To give her children a good education and to have larger home.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and snacks among other things.

loans.name: Norma Celedonia

texts.es:
Norma es una mujer de 30 años, natural de la ciudad de Pisco, distrito de Humay, ella es una mujer muy entusiasta y trabajadora, es una madre soltera, dedicada por completo a sus 2 pequeños hijos con quienes le gusta en jugar  sus ratos libres.
Anteriormente Norma trabajaba en un fundo algodonero, gracias a ese trabajo pudo juntar el dinero necesario para poder independizarse y poner en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, ya lleva 2 años trabajando en su negocio, el cual lo realiza en su casa y los fines de semana sale a ofrecer sus productos al mercado central de su ciudad.
Norma se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como pantalones, polos, blusas, chompas, etc. para abastecer su negocio y mejorar sus ventas; de esta manera podrá incrementar sus ingresos y brindar un mejor porvenir para sus pequeños hijos, logrando con ello su sueño de que ambos sean buenos profesionales y hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Norma is a 30 year-old woman from Pisco, Humay district. She is a very enthusiastic and hardworking woman. She is a single mother and is completely dedicated to her two small boys with who she likes to play in her free time. 

Previously Norma worked in a cotton farm. Thanks to this work she has been able to get together the money to become independent and start her small business selling clothes. She has now been working in this business for 2 years. She carries on the business at her house and on weekends she goes out to the central market to sell her products. 

Norma is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she has been able to buy merchandise such as pants, t-shirts, blouses, jumpers etc to supply her business and to improve her sales. In this way, she can increase her income to provide a better future for her small boys and achieve her dream that both become good professionals and good men.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as pants, t-shirts, blouses, jumpers etc

loans.name: Geronima

texts.en:
This is Geronima, 58, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines. Single, she manages her household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.

Geronima maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products through popular direct selling brands like Avon, Fuller Life, Natasha, Boardwalk and Marikina Shoe Exchange. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. The dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalog, and the difference accounts for the profits that dealers depend on for their income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 2000 in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 12,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy orders for her customers. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 
 
Geronima dreams of expanding her business in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stocks of products needed in her business

loans.name: Ibeth Del Socorro

texts.es: Ibeth se dedicó hace 5 años a hacer cursos técnicos, pues es una mujer muy creativa e inquieta; con todo lo que ella aprendió, emprendió su propia aventura de negocios; primero fueron hermosos adornos navideños, luego lencería para cocina y baño, y posteriormente camisetas alusivas al Carnaval de la ciudad, donde se especializó y construyó su mejor clientela. Sus ventas las realiza en empresas y en los alrededores del barrio, porque en cada temporada, saca un producto adaptado a las necesidades que trae consigo cada época. Así ha logrado apoyar los gastos de su familia, conformada por su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 10 a 16 años, como cuando hizo mejoras a su vivienda y apoyó los estudios de su hija. Su meta es lograr que su hijo esté en salud principalmente y tiene un sueño de prosperidad que radica en el crecimiento y estabilización de su negocio, ingreso desde el cual se teje,  todo lo que ella aspira para si misma y para su familia. Su mayor desafío es que no tiene el capital de trabajo suficiente, para continuar el crecimiento  su negocio y por eso acude a un credikiva, mediante el cual invertirá en la compra de materias primas e insumos, como rellenos, telas, encaje, hilos y botones, con lo cual planea fabricar un mayor numero de productos y aumentar su volumen de ventas, aprovechando que se acerca el segundo semestre del año y es en este, donde se potencializa el crecimiento de cada negocio, porque trae consigo la posibilidad de que sus clientes puedan comprar, teniendo en sus manos, primas laborales, bonificaciones etc.
texts.en:
Ibeth spent five years taking technical courses since she is a creative and eager woman. With everything she learned, she started her own business venture. At first she sold beautiful Christmas decorations, and then kitchen and bathroom linens, and finally T-shirts for the Carnival festivities around the city. The last venture became her specialty and is how she attracted her best customers. Her sales from these ventures are conducted in the surrounding areas of her neighborhood according to each season. She orders products that are adapted to the needs associated with a particular season. These businesses have enabled her to contribute toward the expenses of her family, which consists of her husband and two children (ages 10 and 16). Ibeth helps pay for improvements around her home and for her daughter's studies. Her primary goal is to keep her children healthy, but she also has dreams of prosperity in the form of growing and stabilizing her business. She hopes to continue generating income according to plan. Everything she aspires for is thought of with her family in mind.

Her greatest challenge is not having sufficient capital to continue the growth of her business. For this reason, Ibeth is applying for a Kiva loan so that she can invest in the purchase of materials and supplies such as padding, fabrics, lace, thread, and buttons. She plans to produce a large number of products and increase her sales. By taking advantage of the second half of the year, Ibeth sees potential for growing each of her businesses. The control over what her customers can buy rests in her hands, based on the supplies, labor, discounts, and other factors.

loans.use: to buy padding, fabrics, lace, thread, and buttons.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: El señor Manuel es originario de Granada, casado, padres de tres hijos que viven   independientes, se dedica atender un Kiosco de comida y snacks. El inicio su negocio por herencia que  su madre le dejo a su hermano y este a su vez le vendió el Kiosco a Manuel. Esto  le permitió ser el único propietario del negocio a la edad de 35 años el cual decide sacar adelante con esfuerzo propio siendo este su primer negocio, donde recibe el apoyo de su esposa y uno de sus hijos, sus productos lo comercializa en la misma comunidad y en los alrededores de Granada en Kiosco  muy bonito que también sirve de atractivo turístico para el municipio. Esta muy satisfecho con su negocio ya que en el lugar donde se encuentra ubicado es muy fácil que los visitantes que pasan por la ciudad se acerquen a su negocio a consumir sus productos, en especial el platillo típico de la ciudad llamada vigoron. El crédito lo solicito para comprar paraguas grandes, Sillas y mesas plásticas. Él crédito le ayudara ya que le permitirá mantener a sus clientes  en mejores condiciones, con más comodidad. Sus planes futuros son seguir trabajando para salir adelante y tener una mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Manuel is from Granada. He is married and he is the father of three children who live independently. He has a food and snack kiosk. He started his business through an inheritance. His mother left it to a brother and he sold the kiosk to Manuel. This allowed him to be the only owner of the business at 35 years old. He decided to move forward with some effort since this is his first business. He gets support from his wife and one of his children. He markets his products in Granada and the areas around the city. The kiosk is very beautiful. It also serves as a tourist attraction for the city. 
He is very satisfied with his business since it’s located in a place where it is easy for visitors who come to the city to come to his business and buy his products. In particular, there is a typical dish in the city called Vigoron. The requested loan is for large umbrellas and plastic chairs and tables. The loan will help him to make his customers more comfortable with the better conditions. His future plans are to continue working in order to make progress and to have a better economic situation.

loans.use: purchase large umbrellas and plastic chairs and tables.

loans.name: Paul Giancarlo

texts.es:
Paúl es un joven de 20 años,  muy emprendedor  y trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, caracterizada por sus hermosas playas y clima cálido; en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones le gusta preparar su plato favorito como es la riquísima "Carapulcra con Sopa Seca" a fin de compartir gratos momentos con su familia; con mucho esfuerzo concluyó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria, pero sueña con poder lograrlo algún día.
Paúl trabaja como operario en una carpintería, él dedica gran parte de su tiempo a su trabajo, tiene grandes habilidades como carpintero y se siente muy a gusto desempeñando su labor.
Paúl se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, como es el pintando y mejoramiento de su cuarto; de esta manera podrá tener mayor comodidad y bienestar, logrando fomentar un ambiente agradable para su desarrollo, ya que sueña con cumplir en un futuro no muy lejano su deseo de poder estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en: Paúl is 20 years old, very enterprising and hard working. He lives in the city Chincha, known for its beautiful beaches and warm climate. In his free time he likes to listen to music and on occasion he likes to prepare his favorite dish because he thinks it is delicious-"Carapulcra con Sopa Seca," and so that he can spend some time with his family. He finished his secondary school education with determination, but unfortunately, because he lacks the resources, he cannot study at university, but it is his dream to be able to do so one day. Paúl works as an operator in a carpentry workshop, he spends most of his time working and is a very skilled carpenter and enjoys his work. Paúl is very appreciative of the loans through Kiva, because it is thanks to the help that these loans provide that he will be able to improve his home by painting it and improving his room, by doing so he will be more comfortable and will be able to have a nice foundation to begin his life as he hopes to be able to attend university sometime in the near future.

loans.use: improve his dwelling including painting and improving his room.

loans.name: Mutuku

texts.en:
Mutuku is married with three children between 3 and 6 years old. He lives in a rental house that has piped water but not electricity. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past three years, he has operated a shoe-making business, where he sells at retail to his neighbors. Mutuku dreams of expanding his business and establishing another outlet in the future. With the loan he is requesting, he wants to purchase thread for making shoes. He joined Yehu to access financial services.

loans.use: to purchase thread for making shoes.

loans.name: Carlos Diego Alonso

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven de 20 años,  muy emprendedor  y trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, caracterizada por sus hermosas playas y clima cálido; en sus ratos libres le gusta preparar su plato favorito la Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir gratos momentos con su familia; con mucho esfuerzo concluyó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria, pero sueña con poder estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería de Sistemas.
Carlos trabaja como maquinista de costura, él labora en turnos rotativo, a veces puede ser día y otras puede ser de noche, normalmente trabaja 8 horas diarias; Carlos tiene grandes habilidades en la costura y se siente muy a gusto desempeñando su labor.
Carlos se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una cocina para su madre, así como diversos utensilios de cocina, como ollas, servicios, platos, cubiertos, etc.; de esta manera podrá brindarle algunas comodidades y mejoras en la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Carlos is 20 years old, very enterprising and hard working. He lives in the city Chincha, known for its beautiful beaches and warm climate. In his free time he likes to prepare his favorite dish in order to spend more time with his family. He finished his secondary school studies through much determination but unfortunately because he lacks the resources, he cannot study at university, but it is his dream to one day be able to go to university to major in Engineering. Carlos sews for a living, his shifts are on a rotating basis, sometimes at night sometimes at day. He normally works 8 hours a day. Carlos is very skilled in his line of work and likes his work. Carlos is very appreciative of the loans through Kiva because these loans will help him purchase a kitchen for his mother as well as a diverse range of utensils like pots, coffee sets, plates and silverware etc. In this way, he will be able to provide some commodities and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase a kitchen for his mother as well as diverse utensils for it including pots, coffee sets, plates, and silverware.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 49 years old, married and has a family of 8:  3 boys and 3 girls plus his wife.  Five of his children are at school and one is at the university.

Ahmad has owned a shop for new and used vehicle batteries since 2005.  He has 12 years of experience.  He has one employee in his shop.

Ahmad asked Ryada for funding to buy more batteries and tools for his shop in order to increase his income and improve the life of his family.  His ambition is to open a bigger shop and develop it more.

loans.use: to buy more batteries and tools for his shop

loans.name: Jack

texts.en:
Jack is married with two school-going children. He lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past two years, he has operated a retail shop business, selling to members of his community. He dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 15,000 loan, he wants to purchase shop items, bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase shop items, bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Ana es originaria de Granada, casada, tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad de vida independiente solo uno esta a su cargo. El cual no estudia  porque tristemente tiene problemas de salud pues tiene impedimento mental. Ella es de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta ambulante de shampoo, jabón, chiverías (snacks). Actividad que  inicio con apoyo de su esposo luego ella se quedo con el  negocio a la edad de 52 años anteriormente se dedicaba a los oficios del hogar, cuenta con otros ingresos provenientes del alquiler de cuartos mientras que su esposo sale a las calles a vender de manera ambulante. 
Ella Solicita el crédito para comprar productos tales como shampoo, jabón, chiverías, jabón de baño, paste de baño, entre otras cosas, su expectativa es mantenerse en su negocio, ampliarlo en productos para obtener más ganancias y mejorar su nivel económico.
texts.en:
Ana is a native of Granada. She is married and has three adult children living independently; only one, who sadly has a mental disability and health issues, is still in her care. 

Ana is in the sales trade and works as a street vendor selling shampoo, soap, and snacks. She began this activity with her husband's support, and then took over the business at the age of 52. Previously, she was a homemaker. She has other income from renting out rooms while her husband goes out working as a street vendor.

Ana is requesting the loan to purchase products such as shampoo, soap, snacks, bath soap, and loofas, among other things. Her hope is to remain in business and expand her inventory to increase her earnings and improve her economic level.

loans.use: to purchase products such as shampoo, soap, snacks, bath soap, and loofas, among other things.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is 38 years old and lives in the town of Kinubi in the Hoima region of Uganda. She is married and has 5 children who are all currently in school. For the past 8 years, Jackline has been working hard to manage her retail business, which sells sugar, salt and Blue Band (a type of margarine). 

To help expand her business, Jackline has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more sugar, salt and Blue Band margarine for resale, and will help Jackline to generate greater profits and open up more branches of the same business. Jackline hopes that in the future she will be able to construct commercial houses. 

Jackline is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Jackline who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, salt and Blue Band margarine for resale

loans.name: Lemeria Ole

texts.en:
Lemeria is servicing his third loan of KES. 50,000 with KADET LTD.  The loan will help Lemeria with land preparation and the purchase of more livestock, which he will fatten and sell later at a profit.

He intends to use his anticipated profits to diversify his business and provide for basic family needs. His future dream is to be financially stable.

loans.use: To prepare land for planting and purchase more livestock

loans.name: Lady Susan

texts.es:
Lady es una joven madre, muy trabajadora y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, distrito de Imperial,  ella es casada y tiene una pequeña hija de 4 meses de edad; Lady siempre ha sido una mujer muy luchadora y ha trabajado desde los 15 años, conjuntamente con su esposo juntan esfuerzos para salir adelante y darle lo mejor a su pequeña hija.
Con mucho esfuerzo y entusiasmo Lady se dedica a trabajar como empleada del hogar, realizando limpieza en hogares; su esposo se desempeña como chofer de taxi en una empresa de su ciudad. 
Lady se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, tales como la construcción de una pequeña cocina y un cuarto; de esta manera poco a poco podrá lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construir su vivienda y en un futuro no muy lejano espera poder tener una tienda de abarrotes, asegurando de esta manera el porvenir de su pequeña.
texts.en:
Lady is a young, hardworking and enthusiastic mother who lives in the city of Cañete, within the Imperial district.  She is married and has a four month old daughter.  Lady has always been a very hardworking woman who has worked consistently since she was 15 years old.  She and her husband pool their efforts to get ahead and provide the best for their little girl.

With great effort and enthusiasm, Lady works as a cleaning woman and her husband drives for a taxi company in the city.

Lady is very grateful for the Kiva loans and thanks to the Kiva loans she will be able to buy building materials for a small kitchen and another room.  In this way she can realize her great dream of finishing her home and in the not too distant future she can open a grocery store, in this way securing her daughter’s future.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a laptop.

loans.name: Frank Luis

texts.es:
Frank es un joven muy trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad conocida por su clima cálido y sobre todo por la belleza de la “laguna de Huacachina”, ya que es visitada por muchos turistas en todo el año, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, paprika, entre otros. Cuando Frank tiene un tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos de su barrio, asimismo le gusta en algunas oportunidades aprovecha para comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”.  A Frank le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Mecánica pero por diversos problemas económicos solo pudo estudiar secundaria.

Con mucho entusiasmo Frank trabaja en su negocio como chofer de mototaxi, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y amable con los clientes.

Frank está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar otra mototaxi, el ha venido ahorrando un dinerito pero le falta un poco más para que pueda comprar el vehículo, de esta manera el podrá tener otro vehículo mas y poder tener más ingresos, así de esta manera el seguirá luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una flota de taxis y formar una empresa”.
texts.en:
Frank is a very hard working young man.  He lives in the city of Ica, a city known for its warm climate and especially for the beauty of the “Laguna de Huacachina” [Huacachina Lagoon] as it is visited by many tourists all year.  The district is also characterized by the development in agriculture, especially the cultivation of cotton, grapes, asparagus, and paprika among other crops.  When Frank has free time he likes to play soccer with his neighbors and friends in his neighborhood.  He also likes to make the most of some opportunities to eat one of his favorite dishes which is very delicious “Arroz con Pollo” [Rice with Chicken].  Frank would have liked to study Mechanical Engineering but because of various financial problems he could not attend high school. 

Frank works with great enthusiasm at his business as a mototaxi driver.  He works approximately 10 hours a day and can attend up to 40 customers a day.  He believes he does well at his business because he is very responsible and kind to his customers.  

Frank is very grateful with the loans from Kiva – thanks to the help they have given him he will be able to buy another mototaxi.  He has saved some money, but he needs a little bit more to buy a vehicle.  In this way he will be able to have another vehicle and have more income.  In this way, he will continue fighting to achieve his biggest dream: "To have a fleet of taxis and form a company".

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Mounina

texts.fr: Madame Mounina est une femme mariée qui habite au Sénégal. Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce .Elle pratique depuis 2000 la vente d’habits pour enfants, de parfums, chaussures  et autres articles divers. Elle consacre 6 heures de temps de la journée à cette activité. Elle est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC  et sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs. L’objet de ce financement est de se procurer de l’encens et des pantalons qui seront destinés  a la vente car elle a l’intention de diversifier les produits qu’elle commercialise. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettra de participer a l’amélioration  des conditions alimentaires de  sa famille mais aussi d’épargner de l’argent. Son souhait est de devenir une grande commerçante.
texts.en:
Mounina is a married woman who lives in Senegal. She works in the commercial sector. She has been selling children's clothing, perfume, shoes and various other items since 2000. She spends 6 hours a day selling this merchandise.

Mounina is a member of a UIMCEC branch and is requesting a loan of 100 000 francs. The aim of this funding is to enable her to buy incense and trousers for resale, as she intends to diversify the products that she sells. The increase in her profits will allow her to contribute to the improvement of her family's nutritional status and also to save money. She wants her business to evolve into a large retail business.

loans.use: to buy incense and trousers for resale.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es: El Grupo solidario La Esperanza está compuesto por Josefa Catalina, Martha Lorena, María  Elena  y Rosa la cual tiene su negocio que es pulpería esta actividad inicio con esfuerzos propios el crédito lo necesita para invertir en capital de trabajo como la compra de granos básicos, detergente, jabón, huevos, verduras, frutas, fosforo, candelas , entre otros.
texts.en:
The solidarity group “La Esperanza” (The Hope) consists of Josefa Catalina, Martha Lorena, Maria Elena, and Rosa.

Rosa has her own business managing a small grocery store.  She was able to start her business with her own efforts.  She needs the loan to invest in her business with the purchase of items such as grains, detergent, soap, eggs, vegetables, fruits, matches, and candles, among other things.

loans.use: to buy grains, detergent, soap, eggs, vegetables, fruits, matches, and candles, among other things.

loans.name: Asina

texts.en: Asina is married woman and the mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped-in water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. For the past five years, she has earned a living by running a boda boda (or motorcycle) transport business, operating from home to market. She dreams of expanding her business by purchasing more motorcycles in the future, and is requesting this loan to buy a second motorcycle. Asina joined Yehu to secure access to funds to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle for a transport business.

loans.name: Pc1 Tefess Femme Marayeuse Group

texts.fr:
ce Banc Villageois a était crée le 02/09/2008 il est compose de femmes qui habitent le même quartier .
les membres de ce groupe sont unies par des lien sociaux et s'activent toutes dans le petit commerce.
Madame Coumba est une femme marie âgé de 48 ans mère de 8 enfants dont 4 garçons et 4 filles.
Elle fait du commerce de poisson sur la plage depuis longtemps. Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine . 
Son nouveau crédit de 130000F lui permettra d'acheter du poisson quelle va revendre en détail a l'arrivé des pirogues.
Avec ses bénéfice Coumba va participer a la prise en charge des besoins familiaux (nourriture, santé,scolarisation)
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on the 2nd of September 2008 and is made up of women who live in the same district. The members of the group are united by social bonds and are all small retailers.

Coumba is a 48-year-old married woman and the mother of 8 children, 4 boys and 4 girls. She has been selling fish at the beach for a long time and is experienced in this area of business. Her new loan of 130 000 francs will enable her to buy fish, after the canoes have landed, which she will sell to retail customers. Coumba will use her profits to contribute to taking care of the family needs (food, health, education).

loans.use: to buy fresh fish.

loans.name: Mwikali

texts.en:
Mwikali is married with two children aged between 16 and 20 years. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past seven years, she has operated a grocery business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop to meet her customers' needs in the future. 

With the KES 25,000 loan, she wants to purchase sacks of tomatoes, onions and green vegetables. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, onions and green vegetables.

loans.name: Phoebe

texts.en:
Phoebe is a widow with one child who attends school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past four years, she has operated a pub business. Her potential customers are neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of low sales volume in her business. 

With the KES 30,000 she plans to purchase crates of beer and sodas to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase crates of beer and sodas to sell

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврон женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Жена является вышивальщицей национальных платков. Он трудолюбивый и старается содержать свою семью в хороших условиях, и с этой целью более 3-х лет он занимается услугами перевозки пассажиров по местному маршруту. Также является поваром, он готовит национальные блюда, и предоставляет свои услуги на свадебных мероприятиях и национальной чайхане. У Даврона старый автомобиль и он хочет купить новый семи- местный автомобиль. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Davron is married and bringing up four children. His wife works embroidering traditional shawls. Davron works hard to provide a good quality of life for his family. This is why he   has been providing transportation services for over three years, carrying passengers locally. He is also a chef: he cooks national dishes, for weddings and at the traditional tea house. Davron’s car is old and he would like to buy a new 7-passenger van. He is hoping for your kind help.

loans.use: to buy a car.

loans.name: Celina

texts.en: Celina is married and the mother of a child who is two years old. She owns a house that has electricity and piped-in water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family. For the past three years, she has earned a living by operating a poultry business, selling chickens on a wholesale basis to her neighbors and to restaurant operators. She dreams of expanding her business so that she can supply a larger market in the future. She is requesting a loan for Kshs 20,000 to buy chicks and chicken feed. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Thioce Ouest Ps Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée depuis le 2/09/2008 .Il regroupe des femmes issus du même quartier et des 

quartiers environnants. Les membres qui le compose sont unis par des relations sociales communes et s'activent 

toutes dans le commerce.

Madame Dior est une femme mariée âgée de 45 ans et mère de 6 enfants dont 4 filles et 2 garçons.

Elle pratique le petit commerce par la vente de d'huile de palme et de poissons séchés.

Dior dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine pour l'avoir pratiqué pendant longtemps.

Son nouveau crédit de 350000 lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise pré citée.

Avec ses bénéfices elle va renforcer ses épargnes et satisfaire ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on the 2nd of September 2008. It groups together women who come from the same district and surrounding areas. The group's members are united by common social relationships and all work in the commercial sector.

Dior is a 45-year-old married woman and the mother of 6 children, 4 girls and 2 boys. She is a small retailer and sells palm oil and dried fish. She is very experienced in this area of business, having been in this line of work for a long time. Her new loan of 350 000 francs will allow her to restock on the aforementioned merchandise. She will use her profits to build up her savings and take care of her personal needs.

loans.use: to buy palm oil and dried fish.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is married with four children who attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past month she has been running a food stall business, selling to her neighbors and passerby. She decided to join Yehu so as to access loans to boost her business. Susan is now requesting a loan to purchase food and renovate her food stall.

loans.use: To purchase food and renovate her food stall

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia tiene 45 años, está casada con Andrés desde hace 8 años. Tienen tres hijos a los que cuidaron con mucho amor, ahora viven sólo con la menor, Annica a la que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Carampa.
Su principal ingreso económico lo obtiene de sus siembras de papa, maíz y alverja, las cuales tiene en terrenos propios. Se siente orgullosa de vivir en el campo, cuenta que en los días que no tiene que cuidar de sus sembríos, trabaja como peón recogiendo los frutos maduros de otros agricultores, por lo que le pagan un dinero extra. “No me acostumbro a no hacer nada”, menciona. Esa dedicación que pone en su trabajo le ayudó a conocer compradores de la ciudad, a quienes vende sus cosechas. Asimismo, comenzó a criar animales, tiene cerdos, gallinas y cuyes, los cuales vende a los pobladores de su zona.

Ella pertenece al grupo “Carampa” y este es su  tercer crédito con MFP. Gracias a este apoyo pudo obtener muchos beneficios para continuar con su actividad. Por ello promete ser puntual en sus pagos, además le agrada pertenecer a su banco comunal donde todos los colaboradores son personas responsables y solidarias.  
Claudia invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales y orgánicos para esparcir entre sus siembras de papa.
texts.en:
Claudia, age 45, has been married to Andrés for eight years.  They have three children, whom they take care of with great love.  Now they only live with the youngest, Annica.  They take care of her in their own house in Carampa.

Claudia gets her main financial income from their potato, corn, and pea crops, which are on their own land.  She is proud of living in the countryside.  She says that on the days when she does not need to take care of her crops she works as a day laborer collecting ripe fruit for other farmers, and they pay her extra money.  “I am not used to doing nothing,” she says.

This devotion that she puts into her work helped her to know buyers from the city, and she sells her crops to them.  Also, she started to raise animals.  She has pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs that she sells to the inhabitants of her area.

She belongs to the Carampa group, and this is her third loan with MFP.  Thanks to this support she was able to get many benefits in order to continue on with her business activity.  She pledges to be very punctual with her payments.  Also, she is pleased to belong to her communal bank, where all of her colleagues are responsible and supportive people.

Claudia will use the requested money to buy natural and organic fertilizers to scatter among her potato crops.

loans.use: to buy natural and organic fertilizers to scatter among her potato crops.

loans.name: 12 De Junio Group

texts.es:
Las 15 integrantes del grupo 12 de junio son muy unidas y trabajadoras, se destacan en su barrio por su unión y por el trabajo que hacen, además de que también ayudan a su comunidad.
Margarita forma parte de este grupo, y ella nos cuenta que tiene una peluquería en la cual trabaja todos los días atendiendo a una gran cantidad de personas. Gracias al buen trabajo que hace y a la buena atención que da a sus clientes ya tiene una clientela bien definida que siempre va a su local.
Ella solicita un préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de tintes, gel, tijeras, spray, esmaltes para uñas y demás insumos para poder seguir trabajando en su peluquería. La meta de Margarita es seguir creciendo y a su vez también poder ayudar a las demás personas.
texts.en:
The 15 members of the "12 de Junio" group are very united and hard-working. They stand out in their neighborhood for their solidarity and for the work they do, besides the fact that they also help their community.

Margarita belongs to this group, and tells us that she has a hair salon, where she works every day serving a large number of people. Thanks to the good work she does and the good service she gives her customers, she already has a well-defined clientele who always go to her salon.

She is applying for a loan to be able to buy tints, gel, scissors, hairspray, nail enamel and other supplies so that she can keep working in her hair salon.  Margarita's goal is to continue growing, and at the same time to be able to help other people.

loans.use: To buy tints, gel, scissors, hairspray, nail enamel and other supplies.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.en:
Pamela is married with two children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Pamela has operated a business of selling green vegetables for the past nine years. She sells at the market to her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of fluctuating market prices. Pamela is requesting a KES 40,000 loan to purchase sacks of vegetables, tomatoes, and onions, and to also start another business of selling charcoal. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of vegetables, tomatoes, and onions, and also start another business of selling charcoal

loans.name: Tajy Poty Group

texts.es:
15 mujeres de la ciudad de Paraguarí, amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad, se unieron para poder trabajar juntas y por medio de este trabajo poder ayudar a sus familias, para que de esa forma tengan un mejor estilo de vida.
Olga forma parte de este grupo, y con mucho esfuerzo esta pudiendo salir adelante gracias a su sacrificio y dedicación. Vende frutas de estación de todo tipo, como ser manzanas, bananas, peras, sandias, duraznos y otros, y es gracias a este trabajo que ha podido mejorar sus ingresos y poder ayudar a su familia.
Su sueño es poder tener una frutería y de esa forma tener mejores ingresos y ser una gran microempresaria. Solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas, con lo que se abastecerá y seguirá trabajando.
texts.en:
Fifteen women from the city of Paraguari who are friends and neighbors from this city united, so that they could work together to help their families and in this way improve their living standards.

Olga is part of this group, and with a lot of effort, sacrifice and dedication, she has been able to get ahead.  She sells seasonal fruits of all types, such as apples, bananas, pears, watermelons, peaches and other fruit.  Thanks to this work, she has been able to improve her income and help her family.

Her dream is to be able to have a fruit store, and in this way have a better income and become a great small-businesswoman.  She is requesting a loan to buy fruit to stock up her business so that she will be able to continue to work.

loans.use: to buy fruit to sell

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy is a mother of one child who is enrolled in the local school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped-in water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family. For the last eight years, she has earned a living by operating a beauty salon and a cosmetics shop where her customers are neighbors and passersby. Her biggest challenge is the seasonality of work. Mercy dreams of expanding her business to earn more profits in the future, and is requesting this loan to buy a blow dryer and cosmetics for her shop. She joined Yehu to access financial support to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a blow dryer and cosmetics for her shop.

loans.name: Eucalda

texts.es:
Eucalda tiene 36 años, está casada con Arturo desde hace 20 años. Tienen tres hijos a los que cuida en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Carampa. 
Tiene sus propios terrenos de cultivo. Junto a su esposo, todos los días salen a cuidar de sus siembras de papa, maíz y alverja. Cuando comienza la cosecha comercializa sus productos en la ciudad, donde obtiene buenas ganancias. Además de tener clientes que son conocedores de la buena calidad de sus cultivos. “Todo es natural, no contienen químicos”, comenta orgullosa doña Eucalda. De la misma manera, cría caballos, cerdos y ovejas, los cuales engorda y vende en la feria ganadera más grande de su localidad. Por esa razón, ahora desea mejorar sus ingresos, ahorrar y poder aumentar su ganado para tener un ingreso estable.

Ella pertenece al grupo “Carampa” y este es su quinto crédito con MFP. Gracias a este apoyo pudo obtener muchos beneficios para continuar con su actividad. Por ello promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Además, le agrada pertenecer a su banco comunal donde todos sus compañeros son personas responsables y solidarias. 
Eucalda invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para su próxima siembra de papa.
texts.en:
Eucalda, 36, has been married to Arturo for 20 years.  They have three children which she takes care of in her own home located in the town of Carampa. 

She has her own farmland.  Every day, along with her husband, they go out to take care of the crops of potatoes, corn, and peas.  When the harvest begins, she sells her products in the city where she earns good money.  In addition to having customers that are knowledgeable about the good quality of her crops, “it is all natural, they do not contain chemicals” Eucalda comments proudly.  Similarly, she raises horses, pigs, and sheep which she fattens up and sells in the largest cattle market in her town.  For that reason, she wishes to improve her income, save money and be able to increase her earnings to be able to have a stable income. 

She is part of the group called “Carampa” and this is her fifth loan with MFP.  Thanks to this support, she was able to obtain many benefits to continue with her activity.  Therefore, she promises to be punctual with payments.  In addition, she likes to belong to a communal bank where all of her fellow group members are responsible and supportive people. 

Eucalda will invest the loan in the purchase of natural fertilizers for the next sowing of potatoes.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en: Rehema is married and the mother of two children, both of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped-in water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for her children. For more than a year now, she has earned a living by operating a food stall where she sells items to her neighbors and passersby. Rehema decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business, and has applied for this loan to buy food items such as wheat flour, maize flour and sugar.

loans.use: to buy food, including wheat flour, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Digna

texts.es:
La Sra. Digna  tiene 61 años es comerciante hace mas de 10 años es muy trabajadora y muy dedicada. Está casado con el Sr Elvio tienen 5 Hijos, y gracias a sus esfuerzo todos sus hijos están estudiando.
Manifiesta ella que antes no tenía la posibilidad de estudiar y por eso  su mayor sueño es ver que todos sus hijos sean profesionales para que tengan un futuro mejor.
La Sra. Digna se dedica al comercio, tiene una despensa bien surtida con lo cual abastece a las personas de su barrio. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, lácteos, panificados, carnes y demás insumos de primera necesidad, con lo cual podrá abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Digna is 61 years old and has been a merchant for more than 10 years.  She is hardworking and dedicated.  Digna is married to Sr. Elvio and has five children.  Thanks to all of her efforts, her children are studying.  She says that she never had the opportunity to study.  Therefore, her greatest wish is to see all of her children become professionals so that they can have a better future.  

Sra. Digna is engaged in retail and has a well-stocked food pantry that supplies goods to the people in her neighborhood.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy beverages, dairy products, baked goods, meats, and other items of basic necessity so that she can restock her business.

loans.use: to buy beverages, dairy products, baked goods, meats, and other items.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan tiene 33 años, vive en la ciudad de Itá, el vive con su esposa quien es ama de casa y la que cuida y educa con mucho amor a sus 3 hijos.
